            "title": "前后1080P高清双录：70迈流媒体记录仪抢先体验，这画质满意吗？", 
            "content": "<p>现在，路上的车是越来越多了，光有个行车记录仪可能还不放心，车的后视角我们也想能随时查看。所以流媒体记录仪被开发了出来，70迈之前发的行车记录仪和智能后视镜非常好用，最近上线发布了70迈流媒体记录仪，今天我就和大家一起抢先体验一下，看看它的表现到底怎样。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3c7904d31ad668d30934f3f9e30edad2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3c7904d31ad668d30934f3f9e30edad2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3c7904d31ad668d30934f3f9e30edad2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3c7904d31ad668d30934f3f9e30edad2_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>外观：做工扎实，抽拉摄像头好评</b></h2><p>70迈流媒体记录仪包含好几个套餐，我这个是前后双录套装，双十一预售价399元，到手是259元。包装里面包含流媒体记录仪、记录仪电源线、后镜头+信号线、走线撬棒、固定绑带。安装螺丝和车充头。电源线和信号线非常长，足够一般SUV和小客车走线。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-daf5ee63fb7b23b59344f442883ac49b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-daf5ee63fb7b23b59344f442883ac49b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-daf5ee63fb7b23b59344f442883ac49b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-daf5ee63fb7b23b59344f442883ac49b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>可以看到，流媒体记录仪的整个做工非常扎实，要比360的好很多，屏幕达到了9.35英寸，是一块高清IPS屏幕。操作方式是按键+语音控制，按键部分在屏幕下方，包括电源键和4个功能按键。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-625168fa3e7298924a60b6b83a5e0cff_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-625168fa3e7298924a60b6b83a5e0cff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-625168fa3e7298924a60b6b83a5e0cff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-625168fa3e7298924a60b6b83a5e0cff_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>这次摄像头的部分抽拉设计我非常喜欢，之前智能后视镜是只能旋转，碰到我这种原车后视镜比较大的就会被挡住，现在这个可以向左拉出，能是适配不同长度的后视镜，不过拉出的位置有限，右上角还是有点被挡住了，不过不影响整体记录。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9a820cc45930faaa569222f7ca525411_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9a820cc45930faaa569222f7ca525411_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0d28a612cb9c88a797ebc17dd91b0e31_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0d28a612cb9c88a797ebc17dd91b0e31_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8cf326390b312582cbbb09b520e0ffe1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8cf326390b312582cbbb09b520e0ffe1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8cf326390b312582cbbb09b520e0ffe1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8cf326390b312582cbbb09b520e0ffe1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>顶部是后拉摄像头接口，SD卡槽和电源输入接口。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4da577bd5ff388f9760093b4be72fab3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4da577bd5ff388f9760093b4be72fab3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4da577bd5ff388f9760093b4be72fab3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4da577bd5ff388f9760093b4be72fab3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>电源线的走线不用多说，按照说明和撬线棒很容易就能搞定。后镜头的安装也不用担心，因为70迈和途虎合作，只要你购买了就可以选择到店安装服务。值得注意的是，流媒体记录仪的后摄像头除了具有录像外，还能充当倒车影像，如果你的车没有倒车影像，需要连接倒车信号线，这个最好去线下让师傅安装。但如果和我一样，原本有倒车影像，那就不用接信号线，直接走线连接到流媒体记录仪上就行。我自己就是装在了后车门雨拉下面。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-37060036485b4438d611573d39ef7ac0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-37060036485b4438d611573d39ef7ac0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-37060036485b4438d611573d39ef7ac0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-37060036485b4438d611573d39ef7ac0_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-045815b9c2ce27d54a557d7b31c55ea4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-045815b9c2ce27d54a557d7b31c55ea4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dcd2467f80412755754724e8c70bb5b7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dcd2467f80412755754724e8c70bb5b7_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>硬件配置：1080P前后高清双录</b></h2><p>硬件配置方面，主控芯片采用的是海思Hi3556v200，能满足流媒体的运算需求。前后两个摄像头都支持1080P高清录制，前置镜头F2.0的大光圈、130°广角，后置135°，覆盖三车道绰绰有余，内置470mAh耐高温锂电池，主要是用作停车监控。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-512b3a8fd0a8f5f7b1ada304ef781c89_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-512b3a8fd0a8f5f7b1ada304ef781c89_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-512b3a8fd0a8f5f7b1ada304ef781c89_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-512b3a8fd0a8f5f7b1ada304ef781c89_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>流媒体记录仪本身自带WiFi模块，手机上安装70迈APP后可以直接和流媒体记录仪连接，进行视频的查看下载等。不过流媒体记录仪本身这么大的屏幕，我在使用期间很少使用APP查看，直接大屏看回放，还支持最高8倍速。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0119aea0d3d55db5af9f4b98c4963780_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0119aea0d3d55db5af9f4b98c4963780_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0119aea0d3d55db5af9f4b98c4963780_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0119aea0d3d55db5af9f4b98c4963780_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>上车实录：白天高清，夜晚清晰</b></h2><p>安装后上路实际测试它到底录的怎么样，首先是开机速度，真的是秒开，车打火就快速开机录制。不得不说，大屏加上高清视频带来的视觉效果还是挺震撼的，无论是前视角还是后视角，都非常清晰。下面这几张图是我从录制的视频中截取出来的，可以看出视角覆盖范围很广，录制的非常高清，两边车的车牌清晰可见。对于道路两旁的树之类的绿植色彩表现也不错。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-361b4a928a194e48ed2147da699b6a10_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-361b4a928a194e48ed2147da699b6a10_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;356&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-361b4a928a194e48ed2147da699b6a10_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-361b4a928a194e48ed2147da699b6a10_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c97884fc2bf27a0098fda3f6fe1b8911_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c97884fc2bf27a0098fda3f6fe1b8911_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;358&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c97884fc2bf27a0098fda3f6fe1b8911_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c97884fc2bf27a0098fda3f6fe1b8911_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8a2ac856fb937ecc9fc5a8b7dbd3bc5d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"359\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8a2ac856fb937ecc9fc5a8b7dbd3bc5d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;359&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"359\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8a2ac856fb937ecc9fc5a8b7dbd3bc5d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8a2ac856fb937ecc9fc5a8b7dbd3bc5d_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-585209a125e5646d0c8d7af6f48d76ae_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"359\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-585209a125e5646d0c8d7af6f48d76ae_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;359&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"359\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-585209a125e5646d0c8d7af6f48d76ae_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-585209a125e5646d0c8d7af6f48d76ae_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1fb4543f78a7f1cc06827d523e8b0d87_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1fb4543f78a7f1cc06827d523e8b0d87_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;356&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1fb4543f78a7f1cc06827d523e8b0d87_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1fb4543f78a7f1cc06827d523e8b0d87_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>下面这组是晚上拍的，相比白天的清晰度有所下降，不过这是正常表现，同样很清晰，尤其是对于路上强光的压制，整个视频画面的噪点控制的也挺好，画面看起来很干净。之所以能做到这个效果，是搭载了索尼IMX307传感器，在弱光下也能拍清细节。在路口后置拍的后车，很清晰。官方宣称在雨天或者有雾也能高清录制，我测试的这几天一直天气良好，只能后续再试了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6a495e339bbb72ec538ab35b1d1b82e5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6a495e339bbb72ec538ab35b1d1b82e5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;350&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6a495e339bbb72ec538ab35b1d1b82e5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6a495e339bbb72ec538ab35b1d1b82e5_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f20f2d7fc11310684360b30549465ab_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f20f2d7fc11310684360b30549465ab_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;350&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f20f2d7fc11310684360b30549465ab_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f20f2d7fc11310684360b30549465ab_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f80429c277c7c56bc5e463a868bd092e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f80429c277c7c56bc5e463a868bd092e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;358&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f80429c277c7c56bc5e463a868bd092e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f80429c277c7c56bc5e463a868bd092e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>流媒体记录仪的后视角相比原车的提升可以用非常巨大来形容，消除了非常大的视觉盲区。原后视镜透过车后玻璃能看到的区域非常小，如果贴了膜几乎就废了，而通过流媒体记录仪的后视角，车后方看的一清二楚。70迈流媒体记录仪切换前后摄支持语音快速切换，只要说出切换前摄、切换后摄就能快速切换，安全高效，当然它也可以通过按键切换。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-547a82e438fa753d1ce81ffc7098deb3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-547a82e438fa753d1ce81ffc7098deb3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-547a82e438fa753d1ce81ffc7098deb3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-547a82e438fa753d1ce81ffc7098deb3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在相册里面可以看到，普通视频是前置摄像头录的，后录是后面摄像头的视角，此外还有紧急视频，70迈流媒体记录仪内置感应器，一但发生紧急情况，记录仪会将录制的视频单独存放保护，避免循环覆盖掉。如果发生事故啥的不用担心没有现场证据。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d94aa93a2fd14ebecf02df60b6e9121e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d94aa93a2fd14ebecf02df60b6e9121e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d94aa93a2fd14ebecf02df60b6e9121e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d94aa93a2fd14ebecf02df60b6e9121e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>停车监控功能是在停车后记录仪会进入休眠模式，但是G-sensor会持续监测车辆，如果停车发生碰撞，记录仪会自动开始录制视频，不过这个得呸单独的停车监控线。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-036b52d3cb69cf9a17d77c8cd815de94_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-036b52d3cb69cf9a17d77c8cd815de94_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-036b52d3cb69cf9a17d77c8cd815de94_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-036b52d3cb69cf9a17d77c8cd815de94_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>缩时摄影就是我们平常说的延时，一秒一帧缩时录制，录制24小时的视频所需存储空间仅为普通录制视频的1/30，这种比较适合出去玩的时候录制，可以记录下沿路的风景。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5e0e814340fee5d7c4d913a34050b576_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5e0e814340fee5d7c4d913a34050b576_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5e0e814340fee5d7c4d913a34050b576_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5e0e814340fee5d7c4d913a34050b576_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>语音操控 切换画面安全快速</b></h2><p>70迈流媒体记录仪支持固定语音操作，除了前面说的切换前后画面外，还有我要拍照/录像、打开/关闭屏幕、调高/低亮度，实际体验来看呼出成功率非常高，也非常迅速。这是因为它基于大量数据训练算法，优化声学模型，能够满足复杂行车环境下的语音识别。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-59aee4443a0875fdab1a672654181c44_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-59aee4443a0875fdab1a672654181c44_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-59aee4443a0875fdab1a672654181c44_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-59aee4443a0875fdab1a672654181c44_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>总的来说，70迈流媒体记录仪的前后双录表现都不错，尤其是白天的画质非常清晰。后视角的极大提升对我来说还挺震撼的，虽然原车带倒车影像，但视角小还不清晰，在配合70买流媒体记录仪的后录，简直很舒爽，车后面啥情况看的一清二楚。目前它已经上线开启预定了，这套优惠完到手259元，还是非常具有性价比的，如果你车没有倒车影像，或者你想提升后视区域，减少盲区，不妨买一个试试。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-80bd2dc8f1aa3bebb897088ad7d61693_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-80bd2dc8f1aa3bebb897088ad7d61693_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-80bd2dc8f1aa3bebb897088ad7d61693_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-80bd2dc8f1aa3bebb897088ad7d61693_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2163c5088fa2c5420efca91a4eaaea38_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2163c5088fa2c5420efca91a4eaaea38_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>相信大家都有这样的感触，就是街上的打印店和照相店越来越少了，主要原因是现在大家都用电子档保存，偶尔想打印个东西满街找打印店，即使找到了打印也是黑白1块一张，彩色的最少2块一张，贵就不说了，急用的时候找不到打印的地方才恼火。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0d7e72919a0800b87d152513da46c706_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0d7e72919a0800b87d152513da46c706_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0d7e72919a0800b87d152513da46c706_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0d7e72919a0800b87d152513da46c706_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>前段时间，小米发布了米家喷墨打印机，网上的争议还挺大的，主要争议点是小米新涉足打印机行业，产品靠谱吗，第二点是999元的价格似乎和传统品牌比没有优势，还有米家喷墨打印机不支持直接复印。今天我们就来实际体验看看，米家喷墨打印机到底值不值得买，和这些传统打印机的差异又在哪里。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2d66fbd645c7e0880a65a669b2ea6a37_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"723\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2d66fbd645c7e0880a65a669b2ea6a37_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;723&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"723\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2d66fbd645c7e0880a65a669b2ea6a37_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2d66fbd645c7e0880a65a669b2ea6a37_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>为了作为对比，我在京东上选择了售价都是999元的喷墨打印机，分别是佳能G3800，爱普生L4158和惠普的DJ5278。注意我并没有实际购买去体验这三款，仅仅是以京东商品详情页介绍信息来了解的，如有错误欢迎指正。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b934d5675457ffd9386173d15f767d76_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b934d5675457ffd9386173d15f767d76_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b934d5675457ffd9386173d15f767d76_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b934d5675457ffd9386173d15f767d76_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首先是外观方面，米家喷墨打印机采用白色简约设计的米系风格，与传统喷墨打印机相比外形相差还是挺大的，机身整体看起来很规整简单，合上进纸托盘几乎就是一个小长方体，机身尺寸为 435×263×130mm，重量只有 3.4kg，移动比较方便。其它三个最轻的重量是6kg，最重的8.5kg，搬着锻炼身体还不错。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4f61c8352449d1b2a949bc43e970e738_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4f61c8352449d1b2a949bc43e970e738_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4f61c8352449d1b2a949bc43e970e738_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4f61c8352449d1b2a949bc43e970e738_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>正面只有一个电源键和三个指示灯（WiFi、故障、和油墨量），机身背面设有电源接口和USB接口，除此之外机身没有一点多余的设计。再看看传统打印机的机身设计，以我个人的审美来看感觉有点丑，机身众多按键，操作也很繁琐。当然白色也有缺点，不耐脏易划伤。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-26c8524f43affe3b68d15831f161e4c4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-26c8524f43affe3b68d15831f161e4c4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;432&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-26c8524f43affe3b68d15831f161e4c4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-26c8524f43affe3b68d15831f161e4c4_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01f4be077ee3aa35da5dd1b562d9d203_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01f4be077ee3aa35da5dd1b562d9d203_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01f4be077ee3aa35da5dd1b562d9d203_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01f4be077ee3aa35da5dd1b562d9d203_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>打印机进纸托盘上印有米家的logo，掀开托盘可以看到上面对应纸张尺寸的放置位置，经过内部独特的纸路设计，可以有效降低卡纸率。大家应该发现了，它的出纸口没有托盘，如果打印机放在桌边，打印的纸就会掉在地上，不过为了好看的外观可以接受这个小短缺。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-99cc4712a4b62e517d849e41857bff72_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-99cc4712a4b62e517d849e41857bff72_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-99cc4712a4b62e517d849e41857bff72_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-99cc4712a4b62e517d849e41857bff72_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f2c48090aaa4211b961c9baf793009e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f2c48090aaa4211b961c9baf793009e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f2c48090aaa4211b961c9baf793009e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f2c48090aaa4211b961c9baf793009e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>进纸口旁标有小程序二维码，扫描绑定之后就可以直接用微信小程序进行打印。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4868a0833017fcabf3e874678355d1b3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4868a0833017fcabf3e874678355d1b3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4868a0833017fcabf3e874678355d1b3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4868a0833017fcabf3e874678355d1b3_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8d22e59da5340fa020b2238a70310252_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8d22e59da5340fa020b2238a70310252_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8d22e59da5340fa020b2238a70310252_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8d22e59da5340fa020b2238a70310252_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>按压机身的前盖，可以开启打印机的内舱，在这里可以看到4个墨仓位，随机会配备一套4色的墨盒，一个彩色印刷头和黑白印刷头以及外接电脑的USB转接线。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fee5142276e8681c8edee1aa0fb1118_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fee5142276e8681c8edee1aa0fb1118_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;355&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fee5142276e8681c8edee1aa0fb1118_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fee5142276e8681c8edee1aa0fb1118_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fe94238d3212c3951d7806a2400e09fc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fe94238d3212c3951d7806a2400e09fc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fe94238d3212c3951d7806a2400e09fc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fe94238d3212c3951d7806a2400e09fc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>按照说明书通电绑定后安装墨盒，米家喷墨打印机的墨盒是一次性的，直接将对应的颜色按压互锁就好，换墨只需一按就可以将墨盒弹出，非常的方便，也不会出错。佳能和爱普生的是内置墨盒，加墨是挤进去，惠普没介绍。另外要吐槽惠普，因为机型太多，油墨也太多，找了半天没找到对应的油墨，真的是太折磨人了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cb783b988864be51f945354187cd471a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cb783b988864be51f945354187cd471a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cb783b988864be51f945354187cd471a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cb783b988864be51f945354187cd471a_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5309935841bed1b2fc3d371cb558bad2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5309935841bed1b2fc3d371cb558bad2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5309935841bed1b2fc3d371cb558bad2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5309935841bed1b2fc3d371cb558bad2_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300eb7fbfa1b1846532f433fa50975ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300eb7fbfa1b1846532f433fa50975ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300eb7fbfa1b1846532f433fa50975ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300eb7fbfa1b1846532f433fa50975ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>内舱侧边有印刷头锁，当需要搬运打印机时可以向下扳动锁定，防止印刷头在舱内来回滑动漏墨。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dab7150e48d979e21c601d577bb8ba74_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dab7150e48d979e21c601d577bb8ba74_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dab7150e48d979e21c601d577bb8ba74_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dab7150e48d979e21c601d577bb8ba74_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>按照安装说明装好彩色印刷头和黑白印刷头，这里要注意位置顺序。配备的印刷头有控制芯片，可以实现自动清洁的功能，降低打印时堵头的风险。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9dab6c202fc2b1656498e97e93e730ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9dab6c202fc2b1656498e97e93e730ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9dab6c202fc2b1656498e97e93e730ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9dab6c202fc2b1656498e97e93e730ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-052ba819921000f45d8b5ea23efadc45_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-052ba819921000f45d8b5ea23efadc45_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-052ba819921000f45d8b5ea23efadc45_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-052ba819921000f45d8b5ea23efadc45_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>通过这个表格大家可以看到，在打印的方式上，米家喷墨打印机集中在无线打印上，这也是小米作为互联网公司的优势。爱普生的无线打印也做的不错，相比较而言佳能和惠普则比较传统一点。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffb9264c931987622e49ce69e459159e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"824\" data-rawheight=\"163\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"824\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffb9264c931987622e49ce69e459159e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;824&#39; height=&#39;163&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"824\" data-rawheight=\"163\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"824\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffb9264c931987622e49ce69e459159e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffb9264c931987622e49ce69e459159e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>小米米家喷墨打印机使用了1.2GHz四核+360MHz处理器，配备1GB闪存，2GB运存的独立IOT控制芯片，这在打印机行业里面来说已经是非常非常高的硬件配置了，能提高打印速度，尤其是云端打印响应速度非常快，通过连接MIOT服务器，还能实现各种主流格式文档打印。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f95a0cb311dc4f9cd4e7d387e31e69f2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"442\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f95a0cb311dc4f9cd4e7d387e31e69f2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;442&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"442\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f95a0cb311dc4f9cd4e7d387e31e69f2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f95a0cb311dc4f9cd4e7d387e31e69f2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>这里要强调一下通过MIOT服务器实现云打印，对于经常出差、加班的家长来说无疑是非常需要的，有时孩子老师会在微信群发布作业，这时就可以直接远程打印好，让孩子自己取就行，是不是非常方便。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-28f7570f5de27ed599f9dc6ca80e9932_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"460\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-28f7570f5de27ed599f9dc6ca80e9932_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;460&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"460\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-28f7570f5de27ed599f9dc6ca80e9932_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-28f7570f5de27ed599f9dc6ca80e9932_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6579efd7171e99da9bf948352a1c862f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"460\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6579efd7171e99da9bf948352a1c862f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;460&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"460\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6579efd7171e99da9bf948352a1c862f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6579efd7171e99da9bf948352a1c862f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>我以打印公众号文章为例，一次性打印7张，文字打印的很清晰，关键是里面的表格，图案色彩还原的也很好，这个打印效果我觉得很OK。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fbd86932e2d2fc1138f18d117787f785_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fbd86932e2d2fc1138f18d117787f785_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fbd86932e2d2fc1138f18d117787f785_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fbd86932e2d2fc1138f18d117787f785_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fa0d955c0515dd005126173ef3ec600e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fa0d955c0515dd005126173ef3ec600e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fa0d955c0515dd005126173ef3ec600e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fa0d955c0515dd005126173ef3ec600e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>米家喷墨打印机和佳能的打印精度都达到了4800×1200dpi，是同级别最高的，惠普是 1200 x 1200 dpi，爱普生没标注。不过具体的打印效果没办法对比，只能看看米家喷墨打印机的实际效果。为了测试高精度照片打印，我特意购买了A4尺寸的柯达高光照片打印相纸，图中的照片是我去普吉岛用手机拍摄的，打印的效果让人挺意外的，比米家照片打印机打印的小尺寸照片还要好，饱和度、细节都更出色，腿上的汗毛都打印的很清晰，奈何相机拍不出照片细节。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3dc5cd8c363c52fc8c170dab50048439_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3dc5cd8c363c52fc8c170dab50048439_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3dc5cd8c363c52fc8c170dab50048439_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3dc5cd8c363c52fc8c170dab50048439_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-88ea3cf506ae1dc25ec1310312b93e6f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-88ea3cf506ae1dc25ec1310312b93e6f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-88ea3cf506ae1dc25ec1310312b93e6f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-88ea3cf506ae1dc25ec1310312b93e6f_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-81c628cb4767873d644da8fb367582ef_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-81c628cb4767873d644da8fb367582ef_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-81c628cb4767873d644da8fb367582ef_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-81c628cb4767873d644da8fb367582ef_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>米家喷墨打印机不支持复印功能，不过可以通过手机端拍摄文档进行扫描打印的操作，细节比复印更加清晰，条件是你的手机摄像头能拍清晰，同样扫描功能还细分到了身份证拍摄打印，实际打印效果还不错，相机拍不出来细节，实物比照片清晰很多。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e6934398351964948ad638b21027e35e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e6934398351964948ad638b21027e35e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e6934398351964948ad638b21027e35e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e6934398351964948ad638b21027e35e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d717c7e7da50c8151f9024930fcd41aa_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d717c7e7da50c8151f9024930fcd41aa_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-651b1cdb98209d15cf68c058785cb028_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-651b1cdb98209d15cf68c058785cb028_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>大灯是卤素大灯，下方L形LED日间行车灯。这款车的大灯是手动开关，高配车型是有自动大灯的，今年更新的BX5除了基础款外，其他配置的都有自动大灯+自动雨刷功能。我个人觉得自动大灯应该是标配功能，不然下地库打方向盘的时候又要腾出手去开大灯非常的不方便。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1bb3c8519a8c2d42875554a8f3c346fc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1bb3c8519a8c2d42875554a8f3c346fc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;365&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"365\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-927b512956904936be3e8f8dba56dedd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-927b512956904936be3e8f8dba56dedd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>下面的空调控制方式挺奇特的，左边的旋钮是控制风量，右边的旋钮控制温度，和信号强度一样的强度条指示，不会在中控屏显示，第一次用调了好一会儿，不过新款2020款是数字显示了。4个吹风模式设有单独按键，和内外循环切换会在中控显示。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5ddc7884d8df4aa6d3192a603174240e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"630\" data-rawheight=\"359\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"630\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5ddc7884d8df4aa6d3192a603174240e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f775c9cc1d456db44593f9506b9f51d8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f775c9cc1d456db44593f9506b9f51d8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>中央控制区域里面，6速手自一体自动挡，电子驻车，自动驻车都有，这里自动驻车可能需要适应一下，我自己的车打开后会黄灯指示，自动驻车后变蓝色，而宝沃BX5打开后除了按钮上亮灯指示外，仪表盘上不会指示，只有驻车才会蓝灯指示。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7dc7f5bae35c37a9612fad326123dbec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"958\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7dc7f5bae35c37a9612fad326123dbec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-93a3fc9369423e6f5a23bda649e70a16_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-93a3fc9369423e6f5a23bda649e70a16_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在安全性方面，宝沃BX5采用笼式车身设计，80%以上采用镀锌钢板，强度高，车身轻量化，再加上全方位安全气囊，安全性非常好。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad6cb26934076f4002e53d922e973a03_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad6cb26934076f4002e53d922e973a03_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;394&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"394\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d755754a24af8065ce480301e20178f3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d755754a24af8065ce480301e20178f3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>外观和内饰看完后来看重头部分的驾驶体验，先来说下国庆9天时间里的用车行程，从兰州到我老家是140公里，除了往返外，中间还来兰州一个来回，加上市区开差不多是600公里，期间还去了一趟银川玩，差不多是700公里，然后就是老家到县城等用车，200公里，总共行驶1500多公里，其中大部分是高速，当然还有一些乡下难走的非铺装路。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6ae2957930beae6c69d15bd0a0bc073b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6ae2957930beae6c69d15bd0a0bc073b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6ae2957930beae6c69d15bd0a0bc073b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6ae2957930beae6c69d15bd0a0bc073b_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9d6d881b13236b52f64330f54380ad8d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9d6d881b13236b52f64330f54380ad8d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9d6d881b13236b52f64330f54380ad8d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9d6d881b13236b52f64330f54380ad8d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>宝沃BX5采用的是1.4T涡轮增压直喷发动机，最大功率110kw，最大扭矩250牛米，6速手自一体变速箱。整个驾驶感受不错，方向盘转向非常轻，指向性，转弯半径都不错，开起来给人的感觉是非常安静，隔音做的很不错，比我自己的车安静很多。底盘稳减震好 ，过减速带的时候感觉很温柔，不论是前排还是后排的乘坐感受都很好。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ce6cfe5ce80409558c46499093abf33c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ce6cfe5ce80409558c46499093abf33c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ce6cfe5ce80409558c46499093abf33c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ce6cfe5ce80409558c46499093abf33c_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-17dcc882bd8feda6aaa073bd3c82fc85_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-17dcc882bd8feda6aaa073bd3c82fc85_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-17dcc882bd8feda6aaa073bd3c82fc85_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-17dcc882bd8feda6aaa073bd3c82fc85_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>大家肯定很关心1.4T的动力够不够，可以看到，整个期间我大部分是跑高速，1.4T的动力跑120km/h还是挺轻松的，另外低下车库和坡度大的路段，都能轻松应付，如果用车是在市区，1.4T完全没问题。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-26b9ecb8b9d34b3fdc28828e79672e01_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-26b9ecb8b9d34b3fdc28828e79672e01_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;428&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"428\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-26b9ecb8b9d34b3fdc28828e79672e01_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-26b9ecb8b9d34b3fdc28828e79672e01_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>油耗方面，我老家那边没有堵车，日常表显油耗竟然只有5.5个，实际估计是6.5个左右。跑高速基本都是踩着油满速跑，而且每次都是带着家人，最少三人，我计算了下整个使用期间的实际油耗，大概在8个油左右，没有记精确路程和油量，大家适当参考，毕竟每个人的开车习惯和路况不一样。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0f118e8e5d0a8057afcbdddcc928ca0c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0f118e8e5d0a8057afcbdddcc928ca0c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;398&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"398\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb25508f8c37ddcb0f97a13e160aac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb25508f8c37ddcb0f97a13e160aac_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>同样，宝沃BX5也支持宝沃的B-Link智能互联，手机可以远程控制发动机启停，车门开关，以及查看车辆的状态信息等，不过租来的车体验不到，只能车主绑定使用。在拍照当天，竟然还遇到了一位也是租了这辆宝沃BX5，看来这款车正在慢慢的被大家所关注。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-53ce8fe5e1a0c86dafeac6a1254d1d79_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-53ce8fe5e1a0c86dafeac6a1254d1d79_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-53ce8fe5e1a0c86dafeac6a1254d1d79_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-53ce8fe5e1a0c86dafeac6a1254d1d79_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>总的来说，这款车放在2017年来说还是不错的，驾驶感受好，动力够用，颜值也在线，如果宣传做的好应该会卖的不错。而现在的升级款，外观动力没什么改变，主要是升级了国Ⅵ排放标准，和一些细节智能化上升级，比如自动大灯，主动胎压监测等，这些升级也是符合现代年轻人的用车习惯，如果大家购车预算在15W左右，不妨去试驾感受一下。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c6bf20ede3bf90fd42f172a29fbd25fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c6bf20ede3bf90fd42f172a29fbd25fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>现在，路上的小汽车是越来越多，开车难免会发生点小剐小蹭，虽然事情不大，但如果不快速解决，不但影响自己的行程安排，有时还会造成大堵车影响他人。所以在人手一部高清拍照手机的当下，交警鼓励车主们事故快处，就是车头车尾，以及碰撞部位拍照后先挪车。但这三个角度的拍照有时还不能定责，行车视角的视频可以有效划分双方责任，所以选择一款高清的行车记录仪很关键。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1c2921d5c3ab18d779ee4a7fde7e207b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"581\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1c2921d5c3ab18d779ee4a7fde7e207b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;581&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"581\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1c2921d5c3ab18d779ee4a7fde7e207b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1c2921d5c3ab18d779ee4a7fde7e207b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>最近70迈推出了70迈智能记录仪Pro星光夜视版，主打白天晚上高清行车记录，今天咱们就上车实测，看看它的记录表现。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffab687a18b940d8678a97a78bd6a5b2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffab687a18b940d8678a97a78bd6a5b2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffab687a18b940d8678a97a78bd6a5b2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffab687a18b940d8678a97a78bd6a5b2_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4119153c7cc6091d83087482d5cece1a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4119153c7cc6091d83087482d5cece1a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4119153c7cc6091d83087482d5cece1a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4119153c7cc6091d83087482d5cece1a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>得益于70迈在行车记录仪方面的技术积累和硬件配置的高规格，星光夜视版采用索尼IMX307图像传感器，拥有200万像素 ，可以录制H.264编码的1080P行车视频，加上F2.0超大光圈和130°大广角，使得行车记录视频细节清晰，无论是光线充足的白天，还是夜色黑暗的晚上，都能清晰的记录。下图是我从行车记录视频里面截取的图片。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-501d443ea96b030a895f4172d30e8569_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-501d443ea96b030a895f4172d30e8569_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-501d443ea96b030a895f4172d30e8569_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-501d443ea96b030a895f4172d30e8569_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首先是白天行车记录的视频动图，可以看到非常的清晰，但是动图压缩的厉害，后面几张是视频截图，可以看到前车车牌清晰可见，车道两边的环境也录得非常清晰，而且覆盖的车道也是足够广。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-23e20e4ddbbeb12dadbce2b53e36a7e2_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-23e20e4ddbbeb12dadbce2b53e36a7e2_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-23e20e4ddbbeb12dadbce2b53e36a7e2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;337&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"337\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f42e74a699dd0410bb18a43fa1dee35c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f42e74a699dd0410bb18a43fa1dee35c_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-37dbdcb3465bd7a32e830d2dc8913a0e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"342\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-37dbdcb3465bd7a32e830d2dc8913a0e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;342&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"342\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-37dbdcb3465bd7a32e830d2dc8913a0e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-37dbdcb3465bd7a32e830d2dc8913a0e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d928fda72aef0ef9000d0df9cd74b79d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d928fda72aef0ef9000d0df9cd74b79d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;350&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d928fda72aef0ef9000d0df9cd74b79d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d928fda72aef0ef9000d0df9cd74b79d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>70迈智能记录仪Pro星光夜视版的行车记录视频是自动循环存储的，如果存储卡满了，会自动删除前面录制的视频。如果发生车辆碰撞，会自动录制紧急视频，而且这个紧急视频是单独存放的，不会被正常录制的视频循环覆盖，为交通事故或者碰瓷等情况提供有效证据，还原事情真相。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-93c65bc6839a5f0a352720f14b64a1b3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-93c65bc6839a5f0a352720f14b64a1b3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-93c65bc6839a5f0a352720f14b64a1b3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-93c65bc6839a5f0a352720f14b64a1b3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>70迈智能记录仪Pro星光夜视版内置有500mAh电池，可以实现停车监控，记录仪在停车状态下进入休眠模式，G-sensor会持续监测车辆，如发生碰撞，记录仪自动开启录制停车监控视频，而且在下次开机，也就是开车的时候，记录仪会进行语音及显示屏提示进入相册查看停车监控视频，避免停车被蹭了还不知道。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-90809216809ceb60256d236d675ccbea_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-90809216809ceb60256d236d675ccbea_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-90809216809ceb60256d236d675ccbea_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-90809216809ceb60256d236d675ccbea_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>除了停车监控，还有多种个性选择，插上GPS定制模块，即可实现ADAS高级驾驶辅助，电子狗，行驶轨迹，远程停车监控提醒等功能。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68671c397cf2a61e6dafa70e8bfd637c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68671c397cf2a61e6dafa70e8bfd637c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68671c397cf2a61e6dafa70e8bfd637c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68671c397cf2a61e6dafa70e8bfd637c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在操控方面，70迈智能记录仪Pro星光夜视版和之前的Pro版本一样，具有全功能物理按键，方便快捷设置。还具有智能语音操控，我要拍照，我要录像，开关屏幕均能通过语音控制，动口不动手。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f3d7879fca18faa3ed5f7e908b71e8a3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f3d7879fca18faa3ed5f7e908b71e8a3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "鸿蒙OS首款产品：荣耀智慧屏和智能电视对比评测，差别在哪里？", 
            "content": "<p>面对美国打压的时候，华为让大家知道了技术强大是多么重要，除了5G技术外，大家最期盼的是拥有自己的操作系统。当华为开发者大会公布鸿蒙OS的时候，微博热搜、媒体报道和朋友圈全是关于它的信息，可见鸿蒙OS对华为乃至国产品牌的意义，而且鸿蒙OS已经可以直接应用了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-50ec99395e1e752e01b7bcd3d8380f6a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"420\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-50ec99395e1e752e01b7bcd3d8380f6a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;420&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"420\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-50ec99395e1e752e01b7bcd3d8380f6a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-50ec99395e1e752e01b7bcd3d8380f6a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀智慧屏是全球首款搭载华为鸿蒙操作系统的产品，并且搭载鸿鹄818智慧芯片，有魔法画质引擎、7大画质技术和Huawei Histen专业音效加持，支持大小屏魔法互动，手机或平板通过智慧APP可以直接操控大屏，还有荣耀Magic-link魔法闪投等技术加持。那么它的实际体验到底怎么样，和目前的智能电视相比又智慧在哪里，看看我的实际体验，以及和海信电视的对比。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f2ca3c2fab3210cea92431884fd788e7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f2ca3c2fab3210cea92431884fd788e7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f2ca3c2fab3210cea92431884fd788e7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f2ca3c2fab3210cea92431884fd788e7_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>外观设计：94%超高屏占比 升降摄像头</b></h2><p>智能电视市场，小米电视以低价策略横扫市场，而55英寸的荣耀智慧屏售价3799元起，不以低价入市竞争，延续了荣耀品质保证，做工方面直接对标一线电视品牌。正面采用全面屏设计，达到了惊人的94%，机身采用极窄边框的金属磨砂工艺打磨，配合无缝弯折工艺，使得电视频幕与边框之间的缝隙极小，一眼看过去正面全是屏！尤其是没有开机广告的2秒极速开机后，配合极简设计的脚架，屏幕显示效果非常震撼。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2bbe34ba75266a99178306f725e5cb75_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"454\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2bbe34ba75266a99178306f725e5cb75_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;369&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"369\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5d867b8559992e921513af8b7bf87547_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5d867b8559992e921513af8b7bf87547_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀智慧屏PRO版本顶部配备了一枚隐藏式升降AI摄像头，和升降式的手机一样，只有在视频通话的时候才会升起来，不用的时候收回机身内，既保持了机身的一体性外观，同时也很好的保护了隐私。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-24ea20761ae3dbfdf3cbbd81003005a1_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-24ea20761ae3dbfdf3cbbd81003005a1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-24ea20761ae3dbfdf3cbbd81003005a1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-676adad0f640c919ffee527fb6911c68_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-676adad0f640c919ffee527fb6911c68_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-676adad0f640c919ffee527fb6911c68_b.gif\"/></figure><p>在机身厚度方面，荣耀智慧屏最薄处只有6.9mm，在手机里面都属于超薄范畴，机身中下部是比较厚，因为这里面安装了电源、显示、处理基板、6个10W大扬声器等硬件。机身背部侧面设计的接口包括一个USB3.0、3个HDMI、视频和网络输入接口、SPDIF以及天线接口.USB3.0接口可以直接插入U盘播放4K本地视频，解码打开速度非常快，HDMI接口则可以扩展当大屏显示器，天线接口的设置可以说非常良心，毕竟很多城市还有闭路电视，这在其它智能电视上非常少见。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bf642a87cca3a96785268c1bf1f5b47f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bf642a87cca3a96785268c1bf1f5b47f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
