width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e1f0ba2767e40bb93560a5ac2cab270b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e1f0ba2767e40bb93560a5ac2cab270b_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>鸿蒙OS 顺畅的不像第一次做系统</b></h2><p>荣耀智慧屏说到底其实还是一台智能电视，只不过名字叫智慧屏，未来华为荣耀会围着这块屏幕打造更多智慧场景！大家比较新鲜的是鸿蒙系统和鸿鹄818的表现，实际体验完总结就是顺畅的不像是第一次做系统。鸿蒙OS不仅对华为的意义非同小可，对整个中国品牌也具有非凡的意义，它是一套拥有自主知识产权的操作系统，有了这个操作系统，某些国家的封锁打压我们就没那么被动了，就如余承东所说，随时可以用鸿蒙OS代替安卓。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-60932187b95bec831f3193ec56e54fae_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-60932187b95bec831f3193ec56e54fae_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-60932187b95bec831f3193ec56e54fae_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-60932187b95bec831f3193ec56e54fae_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-60932187b95bec831f3193ec56e54fae_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-60932187b95bec831f3193ec56e54fae_b.gif\"/></figure><p>荣耀智慧屏首发搭载鸿蒙OS系统，直接没有开机广告，开机速度仅2秒，完全断电后开机的速度也非常快。旁边的海信电视不但开机速度慢，而且还有15秒的广告，让人非常奔溃，有的智能电视的开机广告甚至长达一分钟，体验非常的差劲。自从荣耀智慧屏没有开机广告后，后面的极米、TCL也开始取消开机广告了，可见有竞争才有进步，消费者才会受益。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e971a1a79a4620b9ad2e881027e0980_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"413\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e971a1a79a4620b9ad2e881027e0980_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;413&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"413\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e971a1a79a4620b9ad2e881027e0980_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e971a1a79a4620b9ad2e881027e0980_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>打开系统信息可以看到，荣耀智慧屏是HarmonyOS系统，配备4K屏幕，鸿鹄818处理器，2+32GB的存储组合，属于正常价位的硬件配置。HarmonyOS和鸿鹄818处理器配合起来体验非常流畅，处理性能也非常强，比如直接打开本地4K视频，秒解码播放，而海信的电视则需要转圈解码几秒钟才能打开。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cba79bb201caa9180ede921b827eeb5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cba79bb201caa9180ede921b827eeb5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cba79bb201caa9180ede921b827eeb5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cba79bb201caa9180ede921b827eeb5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cba79bb201caa9180ede921b827eeb5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cba79bb201caa9180ede921b827eeb5_b.gif\"/></figure><p>荣耀智慧屏</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e37b5a51288f6b39dac2565a66b8547d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e37b5a51288f6b39dac2565a66b8547d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e37b5a51288f6b39dac2565a66b8547d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e37b5a51288f6b39dac2565a66b8547d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e37b5a51288f6b39dac2565a66b8547d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e37b5a51288f6b39dac2565a66b8547d_b.gif\"/></figure><p>海信电视</p><p>整个UI界面与市面上其他智能电视系统差别不大，操作顺滑简单，没有学习成本。相比海信电视，荣耀智慧屏的UI布局更为合理智能，横向切换分类，纵向瀑布流视频资源。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bc1de0baeb21e7f21f7ac3c11b430665_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"437\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bc1de0baeb21e7f21f7ac3c11b430665_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;437&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"437\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bc1de0baeb21e7f21f7ac3c11b430665_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bc1de0baeb21e7f21f7ac3c11b430665_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f1bcecec609f3b1ccdfaf61c606a3063_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"449\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f1bcecec609f3b1ccdfaf61c606a3063_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;449&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"449\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f1bcecec609f3b1ccdfaf61c606a3063_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f1bcecec609f3b1ccdfaf61c606a3063_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首先是“我家”功能栏，可以串联起家庭成员之间的大小屏交互，手机上安装智慧屏APP，绑定家里的电视，就可以共享“家庭相册”“留言板”“视频语音通话”，比如我试了一下留言板，下午出去拍摄，就可以直接同步到电视上，家里人就能看到。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1302f14f2350a00fe417f556b16e4e21_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1302f14f2350a00fe417f556b16e4e21_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1302f14f2350a00fe417f556b16e4e21_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1302f14f2350a00fe417f556b16e4e21_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-52c6ebc712ba8fe0282a9d022fd6d817_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-52c6ebc712ba8fe0282a9d022fd6d817_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-52c6ebc712ba8fe0282a9d022fd6d817_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-52c6ebc712ba8fe0282a9d022fd6d817_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首页的全部应用中可以看到，荣耀智慧屏将视频通话和智能家居排列在首位，可见对智能家居生态的重视程度。荣耀智慧屏是华为荣耀定位的家居中心产品，会围绕这块智慧屏打造具有丰富联动的智能场景。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2f5a9c24fdef2e05895b9a04b58eabc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"464\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2f5a9c24fdef2e05895b9a04b58eabc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;463&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"463\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6605c964c27734c22be8c8ae23bd1596_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6605c964c27734c22be8c8ae23bd1596_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀智慧屏具有智能语音控制的能力，说出你好YOYO,就可以对IoT设备快速操作，系统中也可以直接看到家中已经连接的智能设备状态，荣耀智慧屏不但可以控制操作单独的设备，还可以场景化执行，比如我设置的回家场景，只要唤醒说出我回来了，就会自动打开台灯，开启家里的净化器，想想如果家里的设备都接入华为“HiLink”，就可以与荣耀智慧屏连接，直接语音操作，大屏显示比单独的智能音箱更直观。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc58784bd221d4d850c28461365d603e_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc58784bd221d4d850c28461365d603e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc58784bd221d4d850c28461365d603e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc58784bd221d4d850c28461365d603e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc58784bd221d4d850c28461365d603e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc58784bd221d4d850c28461365d603e_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-63914b2b47d9195998ddab8b7e1667eb_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-63914b2b47d9195998ddab8b7e1667eb_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-63914b2b47d9195998ddab8b7e1667eb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-63914b2b47d9195998ddab8b7e1667eb_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-63914b2b47d9195998ddab8b7e1667eb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-63914b2b47d9195998ddab8b7e1667eb_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81a9f86fdfea9236eb24f792cd7ecff1_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81a9f86fdfea9236eb24f792cd7ecff1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81a9f86fdfea9236eb24f792cd7ecff1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81a9f86fdfea9236eb24f792cd7ecff1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81a9f86fdfea9236eb24f792cd7ecff1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81a9f86fdfea9236eb24f792cd7ecff1_b.gif\"/></figure><p>这里也顺嘴提一下华为荣耀目前的智能生态圈，包括华为智选、荣耀亲选以及接入华为华为“HiLink”的产品三部分组成，相比米家是生态圈更开放，目前接入的产品已经非常丰富了，而且这个IoT生态圈还在快速发展壮大，因为华为提供了一个开放的平台。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-48ab488a6b4cdadbd5b080cc0c1cac7c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"451\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-48ab488a6b4cdadbd5b080cc0c1cac7c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;451&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"451\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-48ab488a6b4cdadbd5b080cc0c1cac7c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-48ab488a6b4cdadbd5b080cc0c1cac7c_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>丰富的视频资源 4K超清影院级播放</b></h2><p>荣耀智慧屏的本质是一台智能电视，所以视频资源和播放画质是最为重要的一点。视频资源方面，荣耀除了自身的VIP资源外，还与多个视频平台合作，有腾讯极光TV、优酷酷喵、芒果TV等专区。还设置了4K专区，提供了不少的超高清内容。视频VIP会员模式有多种，尤其是超钻会员，打通所有视频资源，不过一年850元折后价还是有些贵的，不够这笔钱我们可以省，因为荣耀智慧屏可以通过Magic-link极速闪投手机视频，只需要我们经常看的视频网站移动会员就行，相信大家都有。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f2ca3c2fab3210cea92431884fd788e7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f2ca3c2fab3210cea92431884fd788e7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f2ca3c2fab3210cea92431884fd788e7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f2ca3c2fab3210cea92431884fd788e7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀智慧屏搭载的是一块A+级IPS高清硬屏，实际分辨率高达4K UHD（3840*2160），87%NTSC广色域，178°的广视角和同时400nit的高亮度，支持HDR10HE HLG双重HDR标准。直接通过播放4K视频来看荣耀智慧屏的屏幕显示效果，下面的图片都是在播放中直接拍摄的图片，并不是静止的壁纸拍摄。可以看到视频清晰度达得到4K标准，屏幕色彩还原准确，色彩饱和度优秀。同样的片源和海信电视对比，海信的显示屏幕亮度明显偏低，色彩的饱和度等都比较一般，而且海信电视解码4K视频的能力也不如荣耀智慧屏。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4acfb804c5cd308d3d75b509f0546725_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"437\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4acfb804c5cd308d3d75b509f0546725_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;437&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"437\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4acfb804c5cd308d3d75b509f0546725_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4acfb804c5cd308d3d75b509f0546725_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>（荣耀智慧屏）</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bfd0c12e254f27c712cb2b6f5ac3ddcb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"425\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bfd0c12e254f27c712cb2b6f5ac3ddcb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;425&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"425\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bfd0c12e254f27c712cb2b6f5ac3ddcb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bfd0c12e254f27c712cb2b6f5ac3ddcb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>(海信电视)</p><p>前面拍的播放样张大家应该也发现了，每张都很清晰没有残影，这是因为荣耀智慧屏具有MEMC动态补偿，即便是高速播放的视频，画面也不会出现拖影等问题。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f566df14aaae91280f9cd63305582f79_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f566df14aaae91280f9cd63305582f79_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f566df14aaae91280f9cd63305582f79_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f566df14aaae91280f9cd63305582f79_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-76b3a684e4f29ac3f662bdf10c5759a5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"450\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-76b3a684e4f29ac3f662bdf10c5759a5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;450&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"450\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-76b3a684e4f29ac3f662bdf10c5759a5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-76b3a684e4f29ac3f662bdf10c5759a5_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-75606a243bd18beb0391273722c05730_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-75606a243bd18beb0391273722c05730_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-75606a243bd18beb0391273722c05730_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-75606a243bd18beb0391273722c05730_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-75606a243bd18beb0391273722c05730_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-75606a243bd18beb0391273722c05730_b.gif\"/></figure><p>荣耀智慧屏还能够自动识别不同类型的视频内容，在对比度、色彩、动态画质等多种参数上自动进行智能匹配（仅支持华为视频片源），可智能匹配模式：影院、体育、图片、少儿、标准、游戏，让显示效果更符合人眼舒适度，当然也可以手动设置。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2eabac14be74d8616955cf475f59ed64_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"325\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2eabac14be74d8616955cf475f59ed64_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;325&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"325\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2eabac14be74d8616955cf475f59ed64_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2eabac14be74d8616955cf475f59ed64_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>影院级的观影除了画质外，音响效果也很重要，荣耀智慧屏配备有6个10W扬声器，4个全频声音单元和2个高音单元组成，超大音腔低音效果震撼。同时还集成HuaweiHisten音效技术，可以实现智能声场环绕，同时还支持无线HWA高清蓝牙协议，通过无线蓝牙音箱布置高清音质环绕影院音效，后期空间很大。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-48a582d7c09c38a15afd5bb4a60b3183_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-48a582d7c09c38a15afd5bb4a60b3183_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-48a582d7c09c38a15afd5bb4a60b3183_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-48a582d7c09c38a15afd5bb4a60b3183_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>1080P升降式AI摄像头</b></h2><p>荣耀智慧屏PRO搭载升降式AI摄像头，支持1080P高清视频通话。这些操作都是在智慧屏APP内完成，绑定华为账号后 ，注册的手机号就是通讯号码，电视端在“我家”板块中即可看见通讯录界面，一键即可快速发起视频通话。手机端在视频通话联系人中可以看到家里的电视，电机就可以进行视频通话。后续升级到EMUI10的华为荣耀手机无需安装APP，直接做到了系统里面，非常强。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-894c17a58336f45fccb79199ad553d2e_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-894c17a58336f45fccb79199ad553d2e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-894c17a58336f45fccb79199ad553d2e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-894c17a58336f45fccb79199ad553d2e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-894c17a58336f45fccb79199ad553d2e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-894c17a58336f45fccb79199ad553d2e_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>荣耀智慧屏的这颗升降式摄像头，除了1080P高清通话外，还具有5m远场拾音，足以覆盖一般家庭客厅。如果是在外出差，想看看家里的孩子和老人，这颗摄像头的体验无疑最好，相比手机视频通话只有一个大头，荣耀智慧屏可以直接看到家里的场景，包括孩子在客厅玩耍也能看到。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-57386fa47190a361764f1293b7fd944f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-57386fa47190a361764f1293b7fd944f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-57386fa47190a361764f1293b7fd944f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-57386fa47190a361764f1293b7fd944f_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>魔法闪投 魔法控屏</b></h2><p>荣耀手机和荣耀笔记本配备的Magic-link就非常的好用，可以急速进行文件图片传输，这次荣耀智慧屏也配备了魔法闪投，将应用场景进一步扩大，最高可实现60帧投屏。魔法闪投可以将手机上的所有内容都能投射显示，手机和大屏无需下载任何APP，轻轻一碰随机附赠的NFC标签，就可以直接把手机内容轻松投屏到大屏上，NFC贴纸可放在方便触控的地方。这也是前面为什么我说可以省下电视会员的钱，因为手机的视频都可以投屏电视看，只需要一碰就行。想想如果是在办公场景，需要演示的时候，直接用手机碰一下就能投屏演示，办公效率提高不少，不在同一网络也没关系。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ea7318ca6c29ed1ef4d10d4b5031eb48_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ea7318ca6c29ed1ef4d10d4b5031eb48_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ea7318ca6c29ed1ef4d10d4b5031eb48_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e779131b95014e1fa481710f3845dd5f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e779131b95014e1fa481710f3845dd5f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e779131b95014e1fa481710f3845dd5f_b.gif\"/></figure><p>荣耀智慧屏还具有魔法控屏，能让手机迅速变成触控屏、键盘、扬声器、遥控器，在智慧屏APP首页点击里面就能进入，实测非常灵敏，延迟很低，左滑右滑，点击进入都可以秒操作。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bb115046e4f98210286aaa048843be79_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bb115046e4f98210286aaa048843be79_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bb115046e4f98210286aaa048843be79_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "米家微波炉体验评测：平板加热、支持米家和小爱同学真好用", 
            "content": "<p>大家都知道，小米除了手机业务外，米家品牌的产品十分丰富，是国内目前最大，产品数最多的IoT平台，覆盖了生活的方方面面。近日米家又丰富了厨房家电，上线米家微波炉，最大的特点是平板加热和接入了米家小爱同学，一起来看看我的体验评测。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0fd0cea7d1b288e3cb1f7cb188ed0800_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"414\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0fd0cea7d1b288e3cb1f7cb188ed0800_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;414&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"414\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0fd0cea7d1b288e3cb1f7cb188ed0800_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0fd0cea7d1b288e3cb1f7cb188ed0800_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>外观：简约白色米系设计</b></h2><p>作为米家系列产品，米家微波炉的外观设计延续米家一贯的白色简约设计，和目前市面上大多数采用黑色设计的微波炉形成很大反差。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bbd5af8590bf63daaedd601c60ad4f7f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bbd5af8590bf63daaedd601c60ad4f7f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bbd5af8590bf63daaedd601c60ad4f7f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bbd5af8590bf63daaedd601c60ad4f7f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>正面是透明玻璃炉门，工作时可以看到里面的照明灯，但是并不能直接透视里面。右边是控制区域，可以看到米家微波炉采用的电子显示屏，用于显示时间、火力、模式等信息，更为亮的白色显得很有质感。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9f703383620f03df95ce6b5188423b4d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9f703383620f03df95ce6b5188423b4d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;960&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9f703383620f03df95ce6b5188423b4d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9f703383620f03df95ce6b5188423b4d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>下方是功能和火力控制触摸按钮，可以调节微波炉的各种模式，食谱等，后面详细介绍。<br/>值得点赞的是，米家微波炉采用的是电子式旋钮控制，按压旋钮是开始和暂停微波炉，旋转控制功能和火力等调节。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8a9b2a64b6f31c82b678d4343d4327e2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8a9b2a64b6f31c82b678d4343d4327e2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d5ad5420c8110c3e533cdf016e5d9c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d5ad5420c8110c3e533cdf016e5d9c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d5ad5420c8110c3e533cdf016e5d9c_b.gif\"/></figure><p>也许你已经注意到了，米家微波炉没有门把手，是通过按右侧最下方的按钮来打开。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb36e912808563ef77a9ac9177557dd5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"395\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb36e912808563ef77a9ac9177557dd5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;395&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"395\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb36e912808563ef77a9ac9177557dd5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb36e912808563ef77a9ac9177557dd5_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_b.gif\"/></figure><h2><b>核心：东芝进口磁控管</b></h2><p>大家都知道，磁控管是微波炉最核心的部件，米家微波炉采用的是东芝进口磁控管，因为它具有出色的微波发射能力和寿命长的特点，能达到4000-6000小时，同时也是业内认可度较高磁控管。磁控管发射微波后，通过波导管导入到微晶平板下，经搅波器使微波均匀的分散到腔体内部，微波直达食物内部液态组织，多方向多角度加热食物，温度均匀。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0196f5a8b2723ce65dbfb1ece66f5c1f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0196f5a8b2723ce65dbfb1ece66f5c1f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0196f5a8b2723ce65dbfb1ece66f5c1f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0196f5a8b2723ce65dbfb1ece66f5c1f_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-315c9aaaf8a12ef013ed3ac5b4ad7a83_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-315c9aaaf8a12ef013ed3ac5b4ad7a83_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-315c9aaaf8a12ef013ed3ac5b4ad7a83_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-315c9aaaf8a12ef013ed3ac5b4ad7a83_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>微波炉按炉盘分为旋转和平板两类，旋转式是最常见的，市面上500元以下的微波炉基本都是旋转式的。米家微波炉采用的是微晶平板加热，相比旋转式微波炉加热更均匀，因为不用旋转，加热带汤的食物也不怕洒。米家微波炉的容积是20L，相比同体积旋转式的要大，三五口之家日常够用。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-15fcf45e3e2c71d314cf366078bbe5a8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-15fcf45e3e2c71d314cf366078bbe5a8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-15fcf45e3e2c71d314cf366078bbe5a8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-15fcf45e3e2c71d314cf366078bbe5a8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>因为底部是和腔体内都是平板直角，清洁非常方便，直接抹布一擦干干净净，家里之前用的旋转式的就很难清洁，尤其是转盘下面和周围，老是布满油污。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-442e0cfc2a34a2ce0bcb915bdde14ddd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"363\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-442e0cfc2a34a2ce0bcb915bdde14ddd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;363&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"363\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-442e0cfc2a34a2ce0bcb915bdde14ddd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-442e0cfc2a34a2ce0bcb915bdde14ddd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>对于安全方面，米家微波炉具有4重微波阻隔，还支持一键儿童锁，除了长按5秒功能键开启关闭外，还可以通过米家APP和小爱同学语音控制童锁，上锁后面板显示LOCK，就不能进行任何操作。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-10a4e6cbbdd0cc1c07d93ab7825e22a7_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d0c134926a85fb50a1346a59b4577e8e_b.gif\"/></figure><p><b>接入米家 支持小爱同学</b><br/>作为米家系列产品，米家微波炉还是一款智能厨电，接入了米家，支持小爱同学控制。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1b79541958a64bd237e00376453fb903_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"653\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1b79541958a64bd237e00376453fb903_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;653&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"653\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1b79541958a64bd237e00376453fb903_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1b79541958a64bd237e00376453fb903_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>通过米家APP可以对火力进行调节，时间进行精确控制，还能进行定时预约。除了火力设置外，还可以看到解冻、食谱、除菌和自选功能，这些也是米家微波炉的特点所在。当然这些功能也是可以直接通过微波炉控制面板手动设置。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d901f2a9de1542b4bf16c80753fbe5af_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d901f2a9de1542b4bf16c80753fbe5af_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d901f2a9de1542b4bf16c80753fbe5af_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a02431d6723ba9097978cc039c197a8b_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a02431d6723ba9097978cc039c197a8b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a02431d6723ba9097978cc039c197a8b_b.gif\"/></figure><p>火力默认是60秒快热模式，我试着加热一大盘粉条炒肉，可以直接加热到食用温度。通过触摸火力按钮可以设置火力模式，循环设置高火、中高、中火、中低和低火五个档位。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-345ada78435e49f4e8b443eedf4c6503_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-345ada78435e49f4e8b443eedf4c6503_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-33c5fc0930769e1c35f63738cc17d28b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-33c5fc0930769e1c35f63738cc17d28b_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>超窄边框+键盘隐藏式摄像头：首创16.1英寸全面屏</b></h2><p>笔记本和台式机在外观上的最大差别是体积，轻薄本要保证轻薄便携，在机身体积上难免要做一些妥协让步。但日常使用、玩游戏看视频等，往往是屏幕越大体验越好，所以在体积没有明显增大，想要屏幕变大的唯一办法是和手机一样，向全面屏进化。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70f78b73972fd76e00c273a2bb51c5d2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70f78b73972fd76e00c273a2bb51c5d2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70f78b73972fd76e00c273a2bb51c5d2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70f78b73972fd76e00c273a2bb51c5d2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>相较于市面上的轻薄笔记本，荣耀MagicBook Pro就这么做了。除基本的硬件配置升级之外，将手机领域成熟的技术运用到PC上，首创16.1英寸全面屏，“四面微边框”设计，同时将传统笔记本正面居中的摄像头，隐藏设计在了键盘区域。正是这些设计创新，荣耀MagicBook Pro在15.6英寸机身上做到了16:9的16.1英寸全面屏，可视面积比15.6英寸机型提升约6.6%，屏占比高达90%。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e6b708ab34974b06c7361239e40f6642_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e6b708ab34974b06c7361239e40f6642_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e6b708ab34974b06c7361239e40f6642_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e6b708ab34974b06c7361239e40f6642_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1526bc79eaf0535aff04a08f01f8b18_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1526bc79eaf0535aff04a08f01f8b18_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1526bc79eaf0535aff04a08f01f8b18_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1526bc79eaf0535aff04a08f01f8b18_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>具体来看，上左右边框只有4.9mm，下边框是14.6mm，比市面上大多数轻薄本的屏占比都要高。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7f2cbc39faa780d59c91910dad3211e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"407\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7f2cbc39faa780d59c91910dad3211e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;407&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"407\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7f2cbc39faa780d59c91910dad3211e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7f2cbc39faa780d59c91910dad3211e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>屏幕素质方面，荣耀MagicBook Pro配备16.1英寸防眩光屏、1080P(FHD) 分辨率、100% sRGB广色域、最高300nit 亮度。实际观感来说，这块屏幕画质表现细腻，色彩也相当准，无论是玩游戏看视频，还是做生产力的剪视频做PPT，视觉效果好视野广。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7e1cd080a8fa6a27ed90482ff4f24775_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7e1cd080a8fa6a27ed90482ff4f24775_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7e1cd080a8fa6a27ed90482ff4f24775_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7e1cd080a8fa6a27ed90482ff4f24775_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>为了让屏幕上边框窄到极致，荣耀MagicBook Pro采用的是按压式归一的隐藏摄像头方案，将摄像头放到了键盘内，用的时候轻按弹起就可使用，不用的时候按压隐藏起来，非常讨巧的做法。实际微信视频测试来看，摄像头的成像非常清晰。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a74e32970300df236c7353dfb33a9e15_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a74e32970300df236c7353dfb33a9e15_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a74e32970300df236c7353dfb33a9e15_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a74e32970300df236c7353dfb33a9e15_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1655f0d949bf955e788ae84bb0861f8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1655f0d949bf955e788ae84bb0861f8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1655f0d949bf955e788ae84bb0861f8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1655f0d949bf955e788ae84bb0861f8_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6a91cf6bdb086e8846934a8e68b3d043_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"464\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6a91cf6bdb086e8846934a8e68b3d043_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;464&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"464\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6a91cf6bdb086e8846934a8e68b3d043_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6a91cf6bdb086e8846934a8e68b3d043_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀MagicBook Pro在电源键上集成了指纹，将开机和输密码统一为一步。而且指纹技术来源于荣耀手机，灵敏度远超传统笔记本的滑擦式指纹，日常使用非常方便，轻轻一触就能从锁屏状态解锁，这点对于办公族来说是刚需。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b20b895e48f17fcbec5db9cd2d301861_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b20b895e48f17fcbec5db9cd2d301861_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b20b895e48f17fcbec5db9cd2d301861_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b20b895e48f17fcbec5db9cd2d301861_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀MagicBook Pro的键盘部分的按键手感舒服，支持三级背光调节，配合超大触控区非常高效，而且这块触摸板本身还通过了微软的精密触控板认证，可以完美实现所有Windows手势。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4da6ca2be7a7c109c035d81fc38341fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4da6ca2be7a7c109c035d81fc38341fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-328be3d4fef1ce7631fb6ae13ad25f7d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-328be3d4fef1ce7631fb6ae13ad25f7d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-328be3d4fef1ce7631fb6ae13ad25f7d_b.gif\"/></figure><p>背光调节<br/>荣耀MagicBook Pro 键盘两边设置了两个扬声器，避免了放在腿上使用时挡住声音的情况。音频还搭载杜比全景声(Dolby Atmos)，通过耳机，使声音仿佛萦绕于四周，特别是看电影大片，带来沉浸式的娱乐影音体验。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-95b53972a83a6455daa77744a686029c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-95b53972a83a6455daa77744a686029c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-95b53972a83a6455daa77744a686029c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-95b53972a83a6455daa77744a686029c_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-76d8a65437f8acd8144d6d5528658052_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-76d8a65437f8acd8144d6d5528658052_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-76d8a65437f8acd8144d6d5528658052_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-76d8a65437f8acd8144d6d5528658052_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4b9f1aad551259e9adb6a6d73c7c75df_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4b9f1aad551259e9adb6a6d73c7c75df_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4b9f1aad551259e9adb6a6d73c7c75df_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4b9f1aad551259e9adb6a6d73c7c75df_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀MagicBook Pro在外观设计加入了手机&#34;握持感&#34;理念，以未来感船身形态、流线型线条楔形锋利侧边为外形设计理念，机身为铝合金材料，整机最厚处约为16.9mm，重量轻约1.7kg，延续了荣耀MagicBook的轻薄特性。相较于同尺寸的笔记本，这个轻薄尺寸还是有得一比，更何况它还是16.1英寸的全面屏。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-557ca555e3ea5d19941dc9f4608c2e43_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-557ca555e3ea5d19941dc9f4608c2e43_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-557ca555e3ea5d19941dc9f4608c2e43_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-557ca555e3ea5d19941dc9f4608c2e43_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-42550a85dd78cc3cfe38d1b11f64457f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-42550a85dd78cc3cfe38d1b11f64457f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-42550a85dd78cc3cfe38d1b11f64457f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-42550a85dd78cc3cfe38d1b11f64457f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>接口配置方面，荣耀MagicBook Pro非常良心，设有三个 USB 3.0 接口、一个 HDMI 接口和一个全功能 Type-C 接口，这样的组合可以满足绝大多数场景。我用优盘拷贝Pr剪辑的视频工程文件，大小都在10G以上，传输的速度非常快非常稳。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-efb586dba97e5b4faaec7a4c9640e73b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"401\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-efb586dba97e5b4faaec7a4c9640e73b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-76367ec5315bb4610cdbb0f742ed65ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-76367ec5315bb4610cdbb0f742ed65ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4c1f1c17d8aa054af1ab4c0896fb7910_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4c1f1c17d8aa054af1ab4c0896fb7910_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4c1f1c17d8aa054af1ab4c0896fb7910_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4c1f1c17d8aa054af1ab4c0896fb7910_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>性能实力派i7-8565U +MX250 独显</b></h2><p>荣耀MagicBook Pro有i5和i7两个版本，都是第八代英特尔酷睿处理器，我手里的是i7版本，配备的是英伟达MX250独立显卡，8GB DDR4 2400MHz双通道内存以及512GB的PCIe 协议固态硬盘。这个硬件配置足以满足日常使用，不管是软件运行速度，还是游戏响应速度，都十分流畅。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0aa4e60956dc72e7fae6d8aab645f8b3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0aa4e60956dc72e7fae6d8aab645f8b3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0aa4e60956dc72e7fae6d8aab645f8b3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0aa4e60956dc72e7fae6d8aab645f8b3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>我们用专门测量显卡性能的软件3DMARK 11P测试，荣耀MagicBook Pro 总分P5317，从数字来看属于不错的水平。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-21c0db0017f34736d88366d6eb338a6a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"413\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-21c0db0017f34736d88366d6eb338a6a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1150&#39; height=&#39;646&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1150\" data-rawheight=\"646\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-17053556ae2c1c89329b35a3d1df9d24_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1150\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-17053556ae2c1c89329b35a3d1df9d24_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-17053556ae2c1c89329b35a3d1df9d24_b.gif\"/></figure><p>散热方面，荣耀MagicBook Pro 搭载了全新的鲨鱼鳍风扇2.0版本，其独特的仿鲨鱼鳍风扇设计，可有效提升风扇转速，加快散热，我玩了50分钟《英雄联盟》，用测温枪测试温度只有40°，散热表现不错，可见荣耀在散热方面还是下了不少功夫。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-659ecaaefdf89ec012e2c1f53c28f1c3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-659ecaaefdf89ec012e2c1f53c28f1c3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-659ecaaefdf89ec012e2c1f53c28f1c3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-659ecaaefdf89ec012e2c1f53c28f1c3_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-debd3930d823b95cd43229ded02566b2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-debd3930d823b95cd43229ded02566b2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-debd3930d823b95cd43229ded02566b2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-debd3930d823b95cd43229ded02566b2_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>荣耀Magic-link 2.0魔法互传：轻轻一碰、手机PC高速互传文件</b></h2><p>现在智能手机的功能越来越强，日常生活工作有一部分用手机要比电脑方便，但是手机和PC互传文件资料一直是个难题，有线非常麻烦不说，很多时候还无法连接，尤其是安卓手机和Mac电脑，简直是不可逾越的鸿沟，通常我都是小文件微信，大文件视频QQ。而这次荣耀MagicBook Pro带来的Magic-link 2.0 魔法互传功能，可以快速实现手机和电脑之间的文件互传。手机背部NFC区域触碰笔记本右下角的 HONOR Magic-link 标签，即可瞬间传送图片、视频、微软office文档，同时还可以实现PC屏幕录屏回传至手机，同时还支持剪贴板共享功能，非常高效，绝对是行业领先设计。如果未来这个技术开放支持，所有带NFC的手机都能操作，那真是颠覆体验的设计。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2c7d7068d8a418184d4d3a2fc00b7d92_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2c7d7068d8a418184d4d3a2fc00b7d92_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2c7d7068d8a418184d4d3a2fc00b7d92_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2c7d7068d8a418184d4d3a2fc00b7d92_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>我们先来演示图片互传，手机选择要传的图片，再把手机靠近Magic-link 贴纸&#34;一碰传&#34;，听到提示音或者震动，荣耀MagicBook Pro 屏幕立马显示出接收图片，传输速度最高可30M／s。当然，新升级的Magic-link 2.0也可以传输视频，而且加入了对Office文档（Word、PPT、Excel等文件）的传输支持。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fd34cf1c511054a6b0cfd47f8ce7ab69_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1150\" data-rawheight=\"646\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fd34cf1c511054a6b0cfd47f8ce7ab69_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1150\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fd34cf1c511054a6b0cfd47f8ce7ab69_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1150&#39; height=&#39;646&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1150\" data-rawheight=\"646\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fd34cf1c511054a6b0cfd47f8ce7ab69_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1150\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fd34cf1c511054a6b0cfd47f8ce7ab69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fd34cf1c511054a6b0cfd47f8ce7ab69_b.gif\"/></figure><p>PC向手机回传也极其简单，只需要在电脑上打开文档或者图片，手机处于亮屏解锁的桌面状态，手机轻触电脑Magic-link 2.0标签，立刻就能速完成传输了，手机电脑互传高效又便捷！</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70a503a43dd1b1711293e551c5586932_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1150\" data-rawheight=\"646\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70a503a43dd1b1711293e551c5586932_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1150\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70a503a43dd1b1711293e551c5586932_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1150&#39; height=&#39;646&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1150\" data-rawheight=\"646\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70a503a43dd1b1711293e551c5586932_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1150\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70a503a43dd1b1711293e551c5586932_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-70a503a43dd1b1711293e551c5586932_b.gif\"/></figure><p>除此之外，Magic-link 2.0 魔法互传还支持&#34;一碰传录屏&#34;以及&#34;共享剪贴板&#34;功能。手机&#34;摇一摇&#34;后，轻触笔记本的 HONOR Magic-link 2.0 标签，就能将笔记本端屏幕录制，回传到手机，无需额外安装录屏软件。这个对于经常剪辑视频的朋友来说非常友好，比如我经常剪视频，需要给朋友预览，传统的做法是你得先渲染导出来，然后再发过去，这种做法其实是非常耗费时间精力的，渲染导出需要时间，而且导出的文件还比较大，传输很麻烦。有了&#34;一碰传录屏&#34;，直接在剪辑软件里面预览，然后录屏发过去，可以说是提高生产力的设计。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d98a7ccbafe8f7d074c5bede6126d8_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d98a7ccbafe8f7d074c5bede6126d8_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d98a7ccbafe8f7d074c5bede6126d8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d98a7ccbafe8f7d074c5bede6126d8_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d98a7ccbafe8f7d074c5bede6126d8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-94d98a7ccbafe8f7d074c5bede6126d8_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e7fe9787249229465296fb09de342d4e_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e7fe9787249229465296fb09de342d4e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e7fe9787249229465296fb09de342d4e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e7fe9787249229465296fb09de342d4e_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e7fe9787249229465296fb09de342d4e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e7fe9787249229465296fb09de342d4e_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d229ecdfc433af7be0e5740eda62ee62_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d229ecdfc433af7be0e5740eda62ee62_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d229ecdfc433af7be0e5740eda62ee62_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d229ecdfc433af7be0e5740eda62ee62_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d229ecdfc433af7be0e5740eda62ee62_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d229ecdfc433af7be0e5740eda62ee62_b.gif\"/></figure><p>&#34;共享剪贴板&#34;更是办公利器，可以跨设备复制粘贴文本，实现隔空复制，比如：将手机端的文字进行复制，然后在PC端直接做黏贴即可，这个功能可以双向操作，手机也能获取PC上面的文字。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-34973b566e6b7dc8e6bc442d08ebba4c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-34973b566e6b7dc8e6bc442d08ebba4c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;452&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"452\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8a7ca969c246d702b7dbc08c6c541ce2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8a7ca969c246d702b7dbc08c6c541ce2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>最近我在体验金史密斯WalkingPad走步机A1Pro，它成为了我茶余饭后在家就能增加活动量的神器。作为最简单经济的健身器材，米家走步机也是这家生态链公司生产的，一起来看看它的体验怎么样。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b1f12043e7891b9891d8f1412e274a09_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b1f12043e7891b9891d8f1412e274a09_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b1f12043e7891b9891d8f1412e274a09_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b1f12043e7891b9891d8f1412e274a09_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b1f12043e7891b9891d8f1412e274a09_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b1f12043e7891b9891d8f1412e274a09_b.gif\"/></figure><p>作为A1的升级版，A1 Pro主要改进了以下三个地方：一是更换为无刷电机，运动时更加静音，承重也由原来的90kg增加到100kg；二是外观配色由原来的时尚灰变为静谧黑，更加沉稳；三是新增了选配扶手，运动时更安全，扶手还适配A1和C1。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e8de2abe76de7d142799542c8d2430b3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e8de2abe76de7d142799542c8d2430b3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e783300e5db966aab8c3630259744e56_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e783300e5db966aab8c3630259744e56_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>打开状态</figcaption></figure><p>WalkingPad A1 Pro虽然机身很小巧，但重量不轻，净重有28kg，如果想直接搬走还是非常困难的。所以它的顶部设计有两个橙色轮子，方便移动收纳，比如运动完塞在沙发底下或者床底，运动时再取出来打开，非常节省空间。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-962636170477a0bd4ee813e64500744a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-962636170477a0bd4ee813e64500744a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-febd5e3ff5dae593a0ba5528621dc344_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-febd5e3ff5dae593a0ba5528621dc344_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>机身全部采用油墨镀膜，喷砂覆面，通体采用令人心境舒缓的静谧黑配色。走步机前方是高透光LED显示面板，白天晚上都能清晰显示，可以循环显示当前的运动模式以及时间、速度、距离、消耗、步数等信息，具体的显示项可以在米家APP中进行调整。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2b6e76f0b56b6c1fc8f6378a6e489339_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2b6e76f0b56b6c1fc8f6378a6e489339_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4c366a875070ca320868fde239542aee_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4c366a875070ca320868fde239542aee_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>WalkingPad A1 Pro有手动（M）和自动（A）两种运动模式，手动模式就是通过遥控器或者米家APP来控制运动速度，而自动模式则是根据用户脚步的变化随意调整走步机的速度，是更高阶的走步方式，对于和我一样的新手来说还是建议选择更容易操控的手动模式，待熟练之后再进阶到自动模式。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-18a57f51e68d5ad0e6cdbc62395f0553_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"390\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-18a57f51e68d5ad0e6cdbc62395f0553_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;390&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"390\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-18a57f51e68d5ad0e6cdbc62395f0553_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-18a57f51e68d5ad0e6cdbc62395f0553_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1017eb1b042bac64c204319e8aab5adb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"380\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1017eb1b042bac64c204319e8aab5adb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;380&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"380\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1017eb1b042bac64c204319e8aab5adb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1017eb1b042bac64c204319e8aab5adb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>机身右侧这里有一个模式切换按键，最主要的作用是用来重置。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-899a6b7ecc971302d05c61460b136961_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-899a6b7ecc971302d05c61460b136961_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-899a6b7ecc971302d05c61460b136961_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-899a6b7ecc971302d05c61460b136961_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在首次使用走步机的时候，必须完成新手引导才能解锁正常使用，速度范围是0.5~6km/h。开始我用默认3km/h的速度走步，等到一两次后正常走4.5km/h差不多，但是极限的6km/h得走得非常快，可以用疾步如飞来形容，所以对于日常走步来说，这个速度范围完全够用。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-25feec03362c05b89896f48cd2706c00_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-25feec03362c05b89896f48cd2706c00_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-25feec03362c05b89896f48cd2706c00_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-25feec03362c05b89896f48cd2706c00_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-25feec03362c05b89896f48cd2706c00_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-25feec03362c05b89896f48cd2706c00_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-234f725149c7890bdeb1b1b4cdb1e548_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"595\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-234f725149c7890bdeb1b1b4cdb1e548_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"595\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-234f725149c7890bdeb1b1b4cdb1e548_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;595&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"595\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-234f725149c7890bdeb1b1b4cdb1e548_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"595\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-234f725149c7890bdeb1b1b4cdb1e548_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-234f725149c7890bdeb1b1b4cdb1e548_b.gif\"/></figure><p>为了能达到舒适走步的效果，WalkingPad A1 Pro的走步带也是有精心设计，表面是细密的“#”字纹理耐磨防滑设计，里面还有缓震效果的EVA柔软层、低摩擦系数的光滑层和坚固耐用的高密度纤维板，使得走步的脚感很舒服。为了安全起见，大家在运动时一定要穿着运动鞋。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1f172da1de0fe3b6cd02a5da8e370c6f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"962\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1f172da1de0fe3b6cd02a5da8e370c6f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;962&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"962\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1f172da1de0fe3b6cd02a5da8e370c6f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1f172da1de0fe3b6cd02a5da8e370c6f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>长时间运动走步带有可能会偏向一边，WalkingPad A1 Pro设计有偏移校正功能，在米家APP里面，打开后会自动进行检测，然后以动画的形式告诉怎么校正，用自带的内六角扳手拧动机身尾部的两个校正螺丝即可。我这个就有一些便宜，照着APP轻松搞定。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-69372e012a379185fe893dc8f9fed397_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"460\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-69372e012a379185fe893dc8f9fed397_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>凭借在数码马达方面的专利技术创新，戴森吸尘器一直是行业里高端产品的代表，拥有一款戴森无绳吸尘器更是成为了生活品质的象征。随着知名度提高，戴森的产品类别也逐渐丰富起来，家居清洁产品里面，除了智能无绳吸尘器和手持除螨吸尘器外，戴森还发布有智能吸尘机器人，但目前网上鲜有评测，今天我就来首发评测体验戴森360 Heurist智能吸尘机器人，一起来看看。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9ffea9dea3d24da18e6a4db6d3a06526_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9ffea9dea3d24da18e6a4db6d3a06526_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9ffea9dea3d24da18e6a4db6d3a06526_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9ffea9dea3d24da18e6a4db6d3a06526_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>外观设计：小机身大吸力，履带越障更强</b></h2><p>外观主体采用深蓝配色设计，机身的体积相比市面上的扫地机器人要小很多，这让它能进到更狭小的区域，我家卧室床和衣柜中间就很小，之前用其它品牌的吸尘器就进不去，只能手动打扫，而戴森360 Heurist则能很轻松的进去打扫。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9988143b00ac17d83efb80e74032e4ee_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"413\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9988143b00ac17d83efb80e74032e4ee_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;413&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"413\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9988143b00ac17d83efb80e74032e4ee_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9988143b00ac17d83efb80e74032e4ee_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>机身顶部配备了360°鱼眼全景摄像头，用于观察房间全景。除此之外，针对鱼眼镜头在昏暗环境下抓取能力容易降低的问题，戴森360 Heurist在相机周围加一圈金色的 LED 辅助照明灯环，在探测到周围亮度较低的时候，会自动把灯打亮，来帮助相机更清楚地捕捉四周的画面，实现暗光下的高效除尘。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-02e3c0f62c6aadb80692987295b3a46d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"335\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-02e3c0f62c6aadb80692987295b3a46d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
