            "content": "<p>工作的朋友应该都有这个感受，做好PPT，走遍职场都不怕，做策划给同事客户讲，做规划汇报给领导看，样样都少不了PPT，而要很好的展示PPT，就不得不用大屏投影。之前的旧款投影，因为各个设备的独立，必须使用线材才能连接使用，最让人头疼的是win电脑和Mac的接口转接线还不能通用，更不用说想直接用手机投屏，这时候如果没有转接线，让领导和客户干瞪眼不太好吧。今天我为大家推荐一款可以用手机电脑无线投屏的高清投影—明基E580，一起来看看。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3b4b6a153ac1d0ae397169d8e8d2380e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"405\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3b4b6a153ac1d0ae397169d8e8d2380e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;405&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"405\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3b4b6a153ac1d0ae397169d8e8d2380e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3b4b6a153ac1d0ae397169d8e8d2380e_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>没有线材的约束 手机电脑无线投屏</b></h2><p>明基E580在外光上最大的特点是带有一根绿色的尾巴，正是有了它才可以更加稳定的无线投屏。明基E580的无线投屏有两种方式，第一是将投影和移动设备连接至同一WiFi下就能轻松投屏。另一种是它自带热点功能，在无WiFi或者信号弱的会议室，将手机电脑连接至投影的热点就可以投屏了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-008c946dc70818cde38b73fce69fc407_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"426\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-008c946dc70818cde38b73fce69fc407_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;426&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"426\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-008c946dc70818cde38b73fce69fc407_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-008c946dc70818cde38b73fce69fc407_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-364b2ea9bf75a9377982f2257ef23453_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-364b2ea9bf75a9377982f2257ef23453_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-364b2ea9bf75a9377982f2257ef23453_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-364b2ea9bf75a9377982f2257ef23453_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>相比有线连接投屏的投影，无线投屏的优点显而易见，首先是免去了繁杂的线材，其次是移动无线投屏，开会投屏时，同事之间无线切换投屏，不用再换位子插线，办公更高效。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0875eadb7e81d678f91facca246dab25_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"800\" data-rawheight=\"450\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0875eadb7e81d678f91facca246dab25_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"800\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0875eadb7e81d678f91facca246dab25_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;800&#39; height=&#39;450&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"800\" data-rawheight=\"450\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0875eadb7e81d678f91facca246dab25_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"800\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0875eadb7e81d678f91facca246dab25_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0875eadb7e81d678f91facca246dab25_b.gif\"/></figure><p>对于投屏设备，明基E580兼容安卓、ios手机和win、Mac OS系统的电脑投屏，安卓手机需要下载APP，ios手机直接用屏幕镜像就可以。这里有个比较特别的点，就是在电脑投屏的情况下，手机可以同时投屏，看我图片演示，左边是电脑画面的投屏，右边是手机的投屏。如果在开会演示策划PPT的时候，可以用手机上网搜索忽然迸发的灵感，或者所需的资料。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-69edb959e8991146cc9a204e1c3eb338_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-69edb959e8991146cc9a204e1c3eb338_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-69edb959e8991146cc9a204e1c3eb338_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-69edb959e8991146cc9a204e1c3eb338_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ce80f83417b729e3bdbd5a80cd0cafdb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ce80f83417b729e3bdbd5a80cd0cafdb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ce80f83417b729e3bdbd5a80cd0cafdb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ce80f83417b729e3bdbd5a80cd0cafdb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>明基E580还支持U盘直读，大容量的移动硬盘也可以，存储在里面的图片、文本、音频和视频等多种常见客户都支持，而且不需要转码。比起之前只能把U盘插在电脑，然后再投影方便很多。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-33962ef7bc6bde9c2adef69b52be7f52_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"420\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-33962ef7bc6bde9c2adef69b52be7f52_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;420&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"420\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-33962ef7bc6bde9c2adef69b52be7f52_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-33962ef7bc6bde9c2adef69b52be7f52_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>当然，明基E580也是可以用HDMI线直连投屏，不过因为无线投屏的强大，随机的HDMI线我就没用过。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5fb1e49001cf5f862696b66fe4bdf845_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5fb1e49001cf5f862696b66fe4bdf845_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5fb1e49001cf5f862696b66fe4bdf845_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5fb1e49001cf5f862696b66fe4bdf845_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>自带安卓6.0系统 除了商务还能娱乐</b></h2><p>将办公商用无线投屏做到极致后，明基E580的智能娱乐系统也表现不错，它自带安卓6.0操作系统，而且还有16GB的存储空间，也是一款名副其实的智能投影仪。向下翻可以看到，机器本身内置了一些应用，比如下面的腾讯视频，不过里面的资源很多要开会员，当然我是不会去开的，因为我有腾讯、爱奇艺等移动会员，这时候只需要用手机来投屏，就能用大屏投影看高清会员视频了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-82c26c86b3b697dd522efb2a7e7e5451_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"426\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-82c26c86b3b697dd522efb2a7e7e5451_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;426&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"426\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-82c26c86b3b697dd522efb2a7e7e5451_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-82c26c86b3b697dd522efb2a7e7e5451_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-06209fd7496736314f4cc53f67d12898_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"462\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-06209fd7496736314f4cc53f67d12898_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;462&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"462\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-06209fd7496736314f4cc53f67d12898_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-06209fd7496736314f4cc53f67d12898_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>明基E580是自带扬声器的，如果你对播放影音视频的音效要求较高，也可以用它的蓝牙功能连接蓝牙音箱，体验会更好。加完班约着同事看看球赛，或者带着妹子看看电影也是极好的。。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e9771013f54f241b4239366267295a44_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e9771013f54f241b4239366267295a44_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e9771013f54f241b4239366267295a44_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e9771013f54f241b4239366267295a44_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>高亮度高分辨率 投屏投影都很清晰</b></h2><p>在公司投屏，不可能像家用投影一样拉窗帘吧，所以商务投影对于亮度的要求很高。明基E580亮度达到了3500流明，这个亮度足以保证投影画面的清晰度，不用专门找背光或者有窗帘的会议室。下面这几张是我在会议室白墙上投屏的效果，投屏的边角都很清晰，而且苹果的镜像投屏延迟很低。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-87e302b94de8f28e938d0717bfcf91e9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"423\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-87e302b94de8f28e938d0717bfcf91e9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;423&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"423\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-87e302b94de8f28e938d0717bfcf91e9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-87e302b94de8f28e938d0717bfcf91e9_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-015fba4542bc73c7aabf96d178480d7f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"317\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-015fba4542bc73c7aabf96d178480d7f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;317&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"317\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-015fba4542bc73c7aabf96d178480d7f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-015fba4542bc73c7aabf96d178480d7f_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d027ea8d73a4297548c0d829f8b6c998_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"416\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d027ea8d73a4297548c0d829f8b6c998_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;416&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"416\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d027ea8d73a4297548c0d829f8b6c998_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d027ea8d73a4297548c0d829f8b6c998_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ae22a7ef98c14f7cd7727393e75ee7b7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"410\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ae22a7ef98c14f7cd7727393e75ee7b7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;410&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"410\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ae22a7ef98c14f7cd7727393e75ee7b7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ae22a7ef98c14f7cd7727393e75ee7b7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>流媒体时代，投屏不仅仅是静态的文字图片，投屏信息更丰富的视频也不少，所以商务投影的分辨率也很重要。明基E580采用的是1080P高清分辨率，无论是图片文字，还是高清视频，都能保证投屏画质细腻。下面是投屏吃鸡时的直拍照片，效果很不错吧。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d7cde2c9d6f4cbe7d7f1f2919a0944e5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"414\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d7cde2c9d6f4cbe7d7f1f2919a0944e5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;414&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"414\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d7cde2c9d6f4cbe7d7f1f2919a0944e5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d7cde2c9d6f4cbe7d7f1f2919a0944e5_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>机身简约大方 接口丰富齐全</b></h2><p>说完核心的投屏体验，最后咱们看看明基E580的外观设计，整体以白色为基调，简约大方，商务风十足。尺寸为296*221*120mm，整机重量为2.6kg，在投影里面属于比较轻盈的，方便来回移动。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68da0450d5bd4e01a5e285c431f5138d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68da0450d5bd4e01a5e285c431f5138d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68da0450d5bd4e01a5e285c431f5138d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68da0450d5bd4e01a5e285c431f5138d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>正面是投影灯泡，寿命达到了10000个小时，左侧是大面积散热孔，保证了投屏时的高效散热。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-006c75881cbf7038060b04550579eb65_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"384\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-006c75881cbf7038060b04550579eb65_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-43d21d9d6fc08bd0fea6ce0a0ae6bf1a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-43d21d9d6fc08bd0fea6ce0a0ae6bf1a_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3bd1edb23acc3339151cfe0df523f499_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3bd1edb23acc3339151cfe0df523f499_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3bd1edb23acc3339151cfe0df523f499_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3bd1edb23acc3339151cfe0df523f499_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>机身各部件组装都是卡扣，很傻瓜很简单，睿米的吸尘器都是这种设计，产品配件之间是可以混用的。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-081f90f86255d7534ef32438b7e42c3f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-081f90f86255d7534ef32438b7e42c3f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-081f90f86255d7534ef32438b7e42c3f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-081f90f86255d7534ef32438b7e42c3f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>机身上面的按键设计还是和以前一样，分布在270°双向手柄上面，下方的是电源键，长安是开关机，短按是在60W/80W/100W三档之前来回切换，顶部的按键也是可以进行切换。一代是只有标准和MAX两个吸力模式，而睿米NEX是三个档位吸力的可调。根据我一代的使用经验，标准的吸力足以满足日常使用，大吸力模式几乎很少开。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1b6b73485c792a4fbc6b522fb5576ef7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1b6b73485c792a4fbc6b522fb5576ef7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1b6b73485c792a4fbc6b522fb5576ef7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1b6b73485c792a4fbc6b522fb5576ef7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>组装好后可以看到，睿米NEX和一代在外观设计上的变化不大，最明显的变化是尘盒部分和出气孔，因为睿米NEX采用了全新的尘气分离技术，能有效解决吸力下降的问题。外观主体是白色，颜值高，不可避免的是不耐脏，尤其是磕碰，大家看看我的一代就知道了，不过嘛，一白遮百丑不是。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-772fc3c96350e8bdbf507545619975fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"385\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-772fc3c96350e8bdbf507545619975fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;385&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"385\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-772fc3c96350e8bdbf507545619975fd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-772fc3c96350e8bdbf507545619975fd_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cc3e32df5ed84082fa5505e0122b8054_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"854\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cc3e32df5ed84082fa5505e0122b8054_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;854&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"854\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cc3e32df5ed84082fa5505e0122b8054_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cc3e32df5ed84082fa5505e0122b8054_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-833568489b4218181e6286e0665fc3eb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"854\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-833568489b4218181e6286e0665fc3eb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;854&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"854\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-833568489b4218181e6286e0665fc3eb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-833568489b4218181e6286e0665fc3eb_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5302ff3f4cdb6666892fe70589ff2b5c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5302ff3f4cdb6666892fe70589ff2b5c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5302ff3f4cdb6666892fe70589ff2b5c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5302ff3f4cdb6666892fe70589ff2b5c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>吸尘器大家最看重的当然是吸尘效果，一代我能坚持用两年，足以说明他的吸尘能力是没问题的，我家里养猫，到处都是猫毛和他弄出来的大颗粒猫砂，一代即使是标准模式也够用。此次睿米NEX采用的是Engine-X数码无刷电机，转速从10万提升都12万，整机功率达到435W，直吸风道设计能让吸入功率高达145AW，真空度可达23500Pa。为了直观测试吸力，首先是很细小的灰尘和猫毛混杂物，大家可以看到一次过很吸的干干净净，同样在标准模式下，换大颗粒的猫砂，同样一次吸的干干净净。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4401c91bb0db2ba015d715b6cfc0c86c_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4401c91bb0db2ba015d715b6cfc0c86c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4401c91bb0db2ba015d715b6cfc0c86c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4401c91bb0db2ba015d715b6cfc0c86c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4401c91bb0db2ba015d715b6cfc0c86c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4401c91bb0db2ba015d715b6cfc0c86c_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc168b077d416dfdba8a26ad17278b86_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc168b077d416dfdba8a26ad17278b86_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc168b077d416dfdba8a26ad17278b86_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc168b077d416dfdba8a26ad17278b86_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc168b077d416dfdba8a26ad17278b86_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc168b077d416dfdba8a26ad17278b86_b.gif\"/></figure><p>第二点是续航，无线吸尘器的续航时间我个人认为重要性仅次于吸力，睿米一代的续航是55分钟，之后的产品都提升到了60分钟，即使每天花10分钟吸家里，一周才冲一次电。加上吸力满足日常，这就是为什么我一代能用两年的原因。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7faacef2945acf216d445aad862a14e6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7faacef2945acf216d445aad862a14e6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7faacef2945acf216d445aad862a14e6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7faacef2945acf216d445aad862a14e6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>使用睿米NEX还有个很大的感受，噪音处理提升非常大，从电机、风道和主动降噪三方面入手，噪音已经很小了，而且吸头部分的噪音也变小了。以前单独用一代没发现，现在一对比觉得世界都安静了很多。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-089b433505095c697822326b94ae7c49_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"391\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-089b433505095c697822326b94ae7c49_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;391&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"391\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-089b433505095c697822326b94ae7c49_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-089b433505095c697822326b94ae7c49_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>睿米NEX的最大增加功能是拖地，吸地和拖地同时完成。在拿到产品之前我有个疑虑，按照之前一代的经验，滚筒遇到谁直接就是和稀泥，能吸拖干净？但实际使用睿米NEX后，我理解了睿米的产品确实没有瞎搞。首先从滚筒材质上，睿米NEX将软绒滚刷升级，使用的是新一代纳米级疏水纤维软绒滚刷，不但防水还抗污。前面吸干净，后面再湿拖，干干净净，非常赞。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d3cb6be7f9eac1ccf60c8df8ac07be5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d3cb6be7f9eac1ccf60c8df8ac07be5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d3cb6be7f9eac1ccf60c8df8ac07be5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d3cb6be7f9eac1ccf60c8df8ac07be5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d3cb6be7f9eac1ccf60c8df8ac07be5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d3cb6be7f9eac1ccf60c8df8ac07be5_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1328a6ce483992d460fd71d70694b72b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1328a6ce483992d460fd71d70694b72b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1328a6ce483992d460fd71d70694b72b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1328a6ce483992d460fd71d70694b72b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>拖地的水箱是磁吸连接，采用的是仿生智能缓滴技术，拖地的实话出水均匀，但缺点是拖完地得把没用完的水倒掉，不然就渗出来了，如果把水箱换成电控的就完美了，希望后面的产品可以升级这点。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-387a97d45e42000403aacfd94b488e7f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-387a97d45e42000403aacfd94b488e7f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-387a97d45e42000403aacfd94b488e7f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-387a97d45e42000403aacfd94b488e7f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-387a97d45e42000403aacfd94b488e7f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-387a97d45e42000403aacfd94b488e7f_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-867b553d9e30a3e697d1be97adeacd35_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-867b553d9e30a3e697d1be97adeacd35_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-867b553d9e30a3e697d1be97adeacd35_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-867b553d9e30a3e697d1be97adeacd35_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-44fdd9b09e801c31fa242ba351a2feac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-44fdd9b09e801c31fa242ba351a2feac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-955a5f4281e78186c2efe629907f9f30_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-955a5f4281e78186c2efe629907f9f30_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>充电方面，除了直插线充电，还配备了磁吸无线充电，将磁吸支架固定在墙上，接入充电线，吸尘器就可靠着无线充电，这个充电底座同时还能发挥支架的作用，靠着墙不会摔倒，之前我的直接靠墙放经常会摔倒，手柄都被摔坏了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0d987df18203512c5ee3fcb4fccbebff_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0d987df18203512c5ee3fcb4fccbebff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>国内已经进入夏天了，天气越来越热，帝都气温都开始逼近40度的高温了。在这么热的温度下，很多人习惯开空调，而且温度设置的很低，这样容易得空调病；另外从炎热的室外回到室内，汗流浃背直接开空调，冷风一吹容易热感冒，最好的选择就是吹风扇。一入米家深似海，因为用的米家产品较多，最近恰好新出了米家直流变频落地扇1X，所以入手了这个，一起来看看。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d6522243719fd8e8d44a859139ee939e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"461\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d6522243719fd8e8d44a859139ee939e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;461&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"461\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d6522243719fd8e8d44a859139ee939e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d6522243719fd8e8d44a859139ee939e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b994db5aa97e78d4f0ed2060d7f1b6d4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b994db5aa97e78d4f0ed2060d7f1b6d4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b994db5aa97e78d4f0ed2060d7f1b6d4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b994db5aa97e78d4f0ed2060d7f1b6d4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>外包装简约，且体积不大，里面只有四样：风扇头、底座、电机连接杆和一个配件包。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b01ccd617ae7eda74e42c338dc85fdb0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b01ccd617ae7eda74e42c338dc85fdb0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b01ccd617ae7eda74e42c338dc85fdb0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b01ccd617ae7eda74e42c338dc85fdb0_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f00319d7b35614fc54ac4ffc8190717b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"459\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f00319d7b35614fc54ac4ffc8190717b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1611b2eaacefb2135f2a7a78666d6cf4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1611b2eaacefb2135f2a7a78666d6cf4_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0f9db68944a12b5c3ae60c5c9fca460a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"853\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0f9db68944a12b5c3ae60c5c9fca460a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;853&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"853\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0f9db68944a12b5c3ae60c5c9fca460a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0f9db68944a12b5c3ae60c5c9fca460a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在风扇顶部的物理控制区域，设有开关键、风速/模式切换键、摇头键和定时键。这四个物理按键的设置也比较巧妙，风速/模式切换键，长按可以切换自然风和直流风模式，然后短按一次风量就在4大风速挡位之间切换，前端的四个指示灯可以很好的显示当前风速。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b74d53ab6fe9fe6ec0c3aba471099325_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b74d53ab6fe9fe6ec0c3aba471099325_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b74d53ab6fe9fe6ec0c3aba471099325_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b74d53ab6fe9fe6ec0c3aba471099325_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>定时按键可以设置1、2、3、4小时的定时关闭，同样用顶端的四个指示灯指示。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5329749ec5dd363a013929810f5f07c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"688\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5329749ec5dd363a013929810f5f07c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;688&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"688\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5329749ec5dd363a013929810f5f07c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5329749ec5dd363a013929810f5f07c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>除了物理按键操作，如果想精确操作米家直流变频落地扇1X的100挡位风速调节和精确定时关闭，就得使用米家和小爱同学了。连接米家APP的时候可以看到，米家直流变频落地扇1X是生态链星月电器做的。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-21b0826d51d1b0316475604c76bb97cf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"688\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-21b0826d51d1b0316475604c76bb97cf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;688&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"688\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-21b0826d51d1b0316475604c76bb97cf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-21b0826d51d1b0316475604c76bb97cf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>在米家APP里面可以看到，米家直流变频落地扇1X有直流风和自然风两种模式，可以进行100挡的风量调节，风扇摇头最大角度为140°，当然也可以设置固定的摆动角度，加上上下39°俯仰可调，满足坐卧吹风。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8f8f7d78c3d68955c1247b25879d6fe5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"460\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8f8f7d78c3d68955c1247b25879d6fe5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ae11a5c7017e1b8afbf9af7f02a9a064_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ae11a5c7017e1b8afbf9af7f02a9a064_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-745f148919432ce04f709bcbbb1d9182_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-745f148919432ce04f709bcbbb1d9182_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;358&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-745f148919432ce04f709bcbbb1d9182_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-745f148919432ce04f709bcbbb1d9182_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fde4137e73d5390bb268e210ae0014db_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fde4137e73d5390bb268e210ae0014db_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;356&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fde4137e73d5390bb268e210ae0014db_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fde4137e73d5390bb268e210ae0014db_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>自然风模式下，吹起来的感觉很舒服，相比普通风扇的直流风，它吹出来的风很柔和，有种春风拂面的感觉。之所以能达到这种效果，是因为米家直流变频落地扇1X的吹出来的风柔和幅面广，用算法模拟自然风的无规律变化，不会像直流风一样让人一直处于热量和湿度高速流失的状态，从而让吹风扇的人很舒服。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7e60e05ddb4733a89ce907a6e1b4d8b6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7e60e05ddb4733a89ce907a6e1b4d8b6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7e60e05ddb4733a89ce907a6e1b4d8b6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7e60e05ddb4733a89ce907a6e1b4d8b6_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f144d9e64160d9eea82524ec5d8cea97_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f144d9e64160d9eea82524ec5d8cea97_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f144d9e64160d9eea82524ec5d8cea97_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f144d9e64160d9eea82524ec5d8cea97_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f144d9e64160d9eea82524ec5d8cea97_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f144d9e64160d9eea82524ec5d8cea97_b.gif\"/></figure><p>米家直流变频落地扇1X采用的7片大面积翼型剖面羽叶，相比普通3叶和5叶的扇叶设计，能更均匀的切割气流，直流风强劲，自然风柔和，同时非常的静音，放在屋里用自然风几乎听不到任何声音。和普通的风扇一比，简直是天壤之别。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7fe734262e0289809e12a0e0cab1a060_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7fe734262e0289809e12a0e0cab1a060_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7fe734262e0289809e12a0e0cab1a060_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7fe734262e0289809e12a0e0cab1a060_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7fe734262e0289809e12a0e0cab1a060_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7fe734262e0289809e12a0e0cab1a060_b.gif\"/></figure><p>用小爱同学控制体验才是最好的，语音控制开关，还可以精确定时开关、风速调节、摇头角度等，体验非常的友好，躺在床上直接喊小爱就行。晚上睡觉的时候，我一般都是定时1小时后关闭，因为开始睡觉的时候热，睡着到半夜就不热了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3eebbdaf8c8c8b9a5926a5fff85a323b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"395\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3eebbdaf8c8c8b9a5926a5fff85a323b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-911f3f4be3a7de09c07b9a30969a3c2a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-911f3f4be3a7de09c07b9a30969a3c2a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-911f3f4be3a7de09c07b9a30969a3c2a_b.gif\"/></figure><p>总的来说，米家直流变频落地扇1X的体验很好，夏天最热的时候搭配空调能让家里温度更快速凉爽，不那么热的时候直接吹自然风舒服。夏天买给父母很合适，如果和我一样已经入米家坑更可以放心买，丰富你的智能家居生活。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3047af712e5895946985a38a8cf7dc4e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"853\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3047af712e5895946985a38a8cf7dc4e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;355&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-cf9d9c98e7a0424cbbe9b5714db19a4f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-cf9d9c98e7a0424cbbe9b5714db19a4f_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-01fa07e0ccb92f92ba239b418465e3fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-01fa07e0ccb92f92ba239b418465e3fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;640&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-01fa07e0ccb92f92ba239b418465e3fd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-01fa07e0ccb92f92ba239b418465e3fd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>第二个是公交卡，小米在刷公交卡方面决定对是国内第一，几乎大部分省份的重点城市都支持双公交地铁，可以看到里面公交卡很多。这里要注意的是，公交卡是需要开卡费的，而且是不能退和转移，也就是说你的小米手机开了，小米手环还是需要单独开。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a6063775d7db728e5445df747ed57a22_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a6063775d7db728e5445df747ed57a22_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;355&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a6063775d7db728e5445df747ed57a22_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a6063775d7db728e5445df747ed57a22_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f5b5e54aa392742ce48f7b22cc0eef65_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"368\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f5b5e54aa392742ce48f7b22cc0eef65_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;368&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"368\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f5b5e54aa392742ce48f7b22cc0eef65_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f5b5e54aa392742ce48f7b22cc0eef65_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>门禁卡功能是只支持模拟没有加密的门卡，比如小区单元门，或者公司门禁。我自己就是模拟了公司的门禁，2分钟搞定，之前经常忘带门禁卡，现在小米手环4直接刷卡，爽到起飞。同样注意的是带打卡信息的门禁卡一般都是加密的，模拟不了，即使模拟了也有可能用不了，具体大家可以自己试试。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6aa089f32d43a43fba7e7362db669da_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"390\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6aa089f32d43a43fba7e7362db669da_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc15747b8b5633228b6f06afba41cdd2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc15747b8b5633228b6f06afba41cdd2_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad6effcb8018be3b344fde8fecc22fef_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad6effcb8018be3b344fde8fecc22fef_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad6effcb8018be3b344fde8fecc22fef_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad6effcb8018be3b344fde8fecc22fef_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>小米手环4NFC版重点是小爱同学，它不是小爱音箱语音唤醒，而是需要在屏幕手动唤醒，向右滑动屏幕就能直接唤醒，可以识别语音指令，执行是以文字的形式在屏幕反馈。比如我用它控制家里绿米的智能窗帘。同样值得注意的是，在使用小爱同学的时候，必须手环是连着手机的，因为这里面是通过小米运动APP，获取你小米账号下的米家智能产品。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2a08c41f897c02961755262c6b829f31_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"359\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2a08c41f897c02961755262c6b829f31_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "拍照第二好的荣耀20 Pro上手体验 四摄给力，颜值在线", 
            "content": "<p>荣耀手机最初成立的任务是为华为开辟线上渠道，对比友商是小米，但经过几年的努力，荣耀发展的十分迅速，现在甚至不愿和小米对比了，今年更是提出做到国内前二，国际前四的新目标。荣耀20pro就是荣耀国际化开端的第一款机型，先在海外发布，然后再国内发布，那么，作为荣耀在海外发布的首款旗舰，荣耀20pro表现怎么样？一起来看看。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ab3cf3604b240fb9dc24a740c61c57d9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"359\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ab3cf3604b240fb9dc24a740c61c57d9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;359&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"359\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ab3cf3604b240fb9dc24a740c61c57d9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ab3cf3604b240fb9dc24a740c61c57d9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀20 Pro拥有4800万像素AI四摄、魅眼全视屏、幻境后盖、麒麟980、4000mAh电池等多项旗舰配置，并且拍照在DxOMark获得111分的全球第二高分。我在海外发布的第二天就收到了这款机器，迫不及待拍了开箱视频。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-22cca11d1d439cb2e99d3bb178f78b32_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-22cca11d1d439cb2e99d3bb178f78b32_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;358&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-22cca11d1d439cb2e99d3bb178f78b32_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-22cca11d1d439cb2e99d3bb178f78b32_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>它正面配备了一块6.26英寸的1080p LCD屏幕，采用的是和荣耀v20一样的通孔打孔方案，孔径很小，再加上四周窄边框设计，屏占比达到了91.7%，屏幕尺寸比v20的6.4英寸小点。如果大家要问我显示效果，只能说lcd永不为奴。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-af300ddb47a10c752b4d0a32f0dcb350_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-af300ddb47a10c752b4d0a32f0dcb350_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;358&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"358\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-af300ddb47a10c752b4d0a32f0dcb350_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-af300ddb47a10c752b4d0a32f0dcb350_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>另外大家关心的打孔部分漏光发黄问题，我这台目前来看并没有出现，屏幕底部的阴影也很小，可以看到比v20好很多。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d79a65a0660c7dc55b888739027c716e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"357\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d79a65a0660c7dc55b888739027c716e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;357&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"357\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d79a65a0660c7dc55b888739027c716e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d79a65a0660c7dc55b888739027c716e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2b9d68a736ee30cbc89d596c3d57221c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"357\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2b9d68a736ee30cbc89d596c3d57221c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;357&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"357\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2b9d68a736ee30cbc89d596c3d57221c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2b9d68a736ee30cbc89d596c3d57221c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>解锁方面，荣耀20 Pro配备了侧边电容式指纹，直接集成在了电源键，触摸就能解锁亮屏，实测速度很快，当然他也可以按压，使用电源键的功能，另外他还有人脸识别解锁。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eac290afaa8bd7073c92d40615ec2510_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eac290afaa8bd7073c92d40615ec2510_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eac290afaa8bd7073c92d40615ec2510_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eac290afaa8bd7073c92d40615ec2510_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀20 Pro底部配备了Type-C接口和单扬声器。值得注意的是，荣耀20 Pro并没有配备更进一步的快充，依旧采用的是和v20一样的5V4.5A 22.5W的快充头，在27w甚至更高快充横行的当下表现中规中矩。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3a277a1eb073eee11106a5af4ec481cb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3a277a1eb073eee11106a5af4ec481cb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;350&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3a277a1eb073eee11106a5af4ec481cb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3a277a1eb073eee11106a5af4ec481cb_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b834dbdea58b5a0b1d48a3085005644_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"383\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b834dbdea58b5a0b1d48a3085005644_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;383&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"383\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b834dbdea58b5a0b1d48a3085005644_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b834dbdea58b5a0b1d48a3085005644_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>机身背部，荣耀20 Pro采用了3D玻璃机身，通过精密双层膜做到了立体镜面效果，不同角度的光线角度看，呈现的视觉效果也不一样，机身看起来挺漂亮，颜值在线。我们这部是幻夜星河，名字很酷炫吧。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-53b055b23f50e0b0dfffdfc3f01f9ec8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"372\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-53b055b23f50e0b0dfffdfc3f01f9ec8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;372&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"372\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-53b055b23f50e0b0dfffdfc3f01f9ec8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-53b055b23f50e0b0dfffdfc3f01f9ec8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>拍照方面是荣耀20 Pro的最大提升，首次采用后置四摄，分别是4800万像素主摄、1600万像素广角、800万像素长焦和200万像素微距镜头，凸起部分还是挺大的。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b524fe5fc3d7c3341bd796117de94ca5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b524fe5fc3d7c3341bd796117de94ca5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;355&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2af838da54ce685483c87a0ef5afece4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2af838da54ce685483c87a0ef5afece4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>4800万像素主摄用的是索尼IMX586传感器，1/2英寸CMOS面积，支持双OIS光学防抖，以及目前手机上最大的f/1.4的光圈，首次送测DxOMark便获得了111的高分，仅比第一名的华为P30Pro低1分。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-42ce8b748af43782fdd9357ff196c1ca_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"907\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-42ce8b748af43782fdd9357ff196c1ca_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d1b6d6d1bb9cb71eb1791d086eb1d6a5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d1b6d6d1bb9cb71eb1791d086eb1d6a5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>看过Aqara安装师傅安装，感觉动手能力强的朋友完全可以自行安装。我买的是带滑轨和安装的套装。在收到产品后，Aqara的安装师傅就主动联系我上门测量，因为我家窗帘是罗马杆设计，窗帘的大的金属环穿过滑杆，Aqara标准的滑轨不适合，和师傅商量后由厂家定制长挂钩，直接挂上去就行。之后没几天就定制好滑轨寄过来了，将原来的罗马杆取下来，将这个滑轨订到房顶，本以为会很麻烦，没想到非常方便，只有10个膨胀螺丝，电钻打个小孔直接就安装上了，挺简单的。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2ce276837b2f5178f71714c46b648dff_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2ce276837b2f5178f71714c46b648dff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2ce276837b2f5178f71714c46b648dff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2ce276837b2f5178f71714c46b648dff_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>多种操作方式 互动互联才是智能家居</b></h2><p>下面来着重说说这个窗帘电机的互联及非常人性化的多种操作方式。在米家生态下，智能窗帘电机可以和Aqara的其他设备联动使用。Aqara智能窗帘电机B1锂电池版内置Zigbee模块，通过网关设备可以和其他设备组成智能生活场景。例如“打开家门，窗帘自动开启”的回家模式等，如果你家是米家或者Aqara的智能门锁，就可以设置联动，因为我家的智能门锁没有接入米家，没法实际体验这个功能。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-88d99badcaf7ce6e352eec36b1b47e75_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"689\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-88d99badcaf7ce6e352eec36b1b47e75_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;689&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"689\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-88d99badcaf7ce6e352eec36b1b47e75_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-88d99badcaf7ce6e352eec36b1b47e75_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>Aqara智能窗帘电机B1锂电池版必须通过网关才能使用，我配的是Aqara自家的网关，它同样接入了米家，还支持苹果HomeKit。除了网关功能外，它还具有夜灯和警报等功能。其他网关还支持米家和Aqara的空调伴侣。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f0fedd0195a19c668fa36c266ae0d4b1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f0fedd0195a19c668fa36c266ae0d4b1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f0fedd0195a19c668fa36c266ae0d4b1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f0fedd0195a19c668fa36c266ae0d4b1_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-96120a024ab5f200d4a79d53adfefb1e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-96120a024ab5f200d4a79d53adfefb1e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-96120a024ab5f200d4a79d53adfefb1e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-96120a024ab5f200d4a79d53adfefb1e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>另外我还配了一个贴墙式Aqara无线开关，再搭配我原来就有的小爱同学，完美。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-28107c5499bf632bb3dfc3ea272d3400_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-28107c5499bf632bb3dfc3ea272d3400_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>今年手机厂商都十分焦虑，就连一直高配低价的OV也开始推主打线上性价比的子品牌了，这种趋势似乎蔓延到了国际大厂三星身上，上个月推出了一款主打性价比的千元机，三星A60元气版，网友们纷纷称它为真香机，一起来看看它香在哪里。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f50d5118ba4e70ac4bd36e0c8fe39557_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f50d5118ba4e70ac4bd36e0c8fe39557_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f50d5118ba4e70ac4bd36e0c8fe39557_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f50d5118ba4e70ac4bd36e0c8fe39557_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首先是正面打孔屏，这是千元机里面首款采用打孔方案的手机，之前发布的三星A8s，华为nova4和荣耀V20，虽然都是打孔屏，但价格都在2000元以上。三星A60元气版采用的是一块6.3英寸超清黑瞳全视屏，因为采用了打孔方案和屏幕发声技术，它的屏占比高达91.8%。机身背部的配色也比较时尚，我这部是丹宁黑。左上角是竖排三摄加闪光灯，中间是后置指纹。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ea6ac37f2fcbe47786926a3dc1c3bfa7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ea6ac37f2fcbe47786926a3dc1c3bfa7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ea6ac37f2fcbe47786926a3dc1c3bfa7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ea6ac37f2fcbe47786926a3dc1c3bfa7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>大家都知道，三星作为OLED屏幕领域头部供应商，自家产品当然是用同级最好的屏幕。A60元气版的屏幕也不意外，我们拿它和同级别的荣耀20i对比，屏幕素质一眼就能看出谁更好。左上角的前置打孔采用的盲孔方案，相比三星A8s的通孔在透光率和漏光方面存在隐患，实测通透性确实没有通孔好，但漏光几乎没有。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-332fb18d77cd3a539961e5adcb309657_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"500\" data-rawheight=\"282\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"500\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-332fb18d77cd3a539961e5adcb309657_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;500&#39; height=&#39;282&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"500\" data-rawheight=\"282\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"500\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-332fb18d77cd3a539961e5adcb309657_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-332fb18d77cd3a539961e5adcb309657_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a534f8f0c92a6330104b0cc7e05f65ce_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"500\" data-rawheight=\"289\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"500\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a534f8f0c92a6330104b0cc7e05f65ce_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;500&#39; height=&#39;289&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"500\" data-rawheight=\"289\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"500\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a534f8f0c92a6330104b0cc7e05f65ce_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a534f8f0c92a6330104b0cc7e05f65ce_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>A60元气版是三星首款采用屏幕振动发声来实现听筒功能的手机，去掉了屏幕顶部的听筒，注意这个发声只限于语音通话。我实际通话测试，声音很清晰，正常使用没有任何问题。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-74570255dff83634d03937b725125654_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"500\" data-rawheight=\"290\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"500\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-74570255dff83634d03937b725125654_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;500&#39; height=&#39;317&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"500\" data-rawheight=\"317\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"500\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-cd537660866cf4aead5c4634ea81cd7b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-cd537660866cf4aead5c4634ea81cd7b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>系统是三星的One UI，大家应该不陌生，整体的UI风格很清新，交互切换流畅，启动应用的速度还不错。此外还有单手导航模式，从底部拐角上滑就能打开。续航方面，它配备的3500mAh电池容量，可能是对于如此轻薄机身的妥协，7.9mm的机身厚度，168g的重量手感确实不错。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-de66250445439fa8f75eca9d106f76a6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"500\" data-rawheight=\"318\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"500\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-de66250445439fa8f75eca9d106f76a6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
