            "content": "<p>目前，大家都认为智能手表中，除了Apple watch其它手表都没啥用，但其实并非这样，因为每个人或者每个区域的用户需求是不一样的。而对于国内的用户，华米可以说是相当熟悉其用户的需求，成立三年多成长为全球最大智能可穿戴设备厂商也足以说明这点。9月份，华米发布了备受关注的AMAZFIT智能手表，售价799元，拥有5天长续航+百城公交卡门禁非常实用，此外还具有11项运动模式，双星定位，米家控制，小爱同学等加分项，非常具有吸引力。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e40cea443e6b6c93407496a44011d0c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e40cea443e6b6c93407496a44011d0c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e40cea443e6b6c93407496a44011d0c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e40cea443e6b6c93407496a44011d0c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首先在产品外包装上，华米AMAZFIT智能手表整体依旧采用极简风格，包装颜色上采用了简洁白色系来搭配矩形方盒，除了华米AMAZFIT智能手表主机外，包装盒内还附带了一个专属充电底座和一张说明书。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6377261f1eeb82e0c52d936bf61aad99_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6377261f1eeb82e0c52d936bf61aad99_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6377261f1eeb82e0c52d936bf61aad99_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6377261f1eeb82e0c52d936bf61aad99_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>华米AMAZFIT智能手表延续了圆形表盘设计，搭载1.3 英寸AMOLED 显示屏，分辨率为360 x 360，显示效果很不错。白色机身除了科技感十足也更年轻时尚。手表在表身未出现常规的金属、陶瓷等材质，而是选用了特制的玻纤加强聚碳酸酯，机身整体更为年轻时尚，整机约重46g，佩戴起来很轻巧。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ad2858e6d2ac3e602253dbb9dd698ff5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ad2858e6d2ac3e602253dbb9dd698ff5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ad2858e6d2ac3e602253dbb9dd698ff5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ad2858e6d2ac3e602253dbb9dd698ff5_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f729c4107dc474a1a5d84549ff599dad_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f729c4107dc474a1a5d84549ff599dad_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f729c4107dc474a1a5d84549ff599dad_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f729c4107dc474a1a5d84549ff599dad_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>细节上，华米AMAZFIT智能手表左侧设有红色的HOME按键，非常吸引眼球，也是手表上唯一的按键，旁边为麦克风开孔，另一侧为条形扬声器。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-372a79aef630e79435375d8ef2a89fff_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-372a79aef630e79435375d8ef2a89fff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-372a79aef630e79435375d8ef2a89fff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-372a79aef630e79435375d8ef2a89fff_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6de56a5b7021ef8f40a61cecf61d8453_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6de56a5b7021ef8f40a61cecf61d8453_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6de56a5b7021ef8f40a61cecf61d8453_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6de56a5b7021ef8f40a61cecf61d8453_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>对于长期佩戴手表或者手环的人来说，除了机身外最重要的就是表带了，而且每块手表的表带在一定程度上可以体现出厂商的细节态度。华米AMAZFIT智能手采用了Cleaning腕带处理工艺，其通过将硅胶材质的腕带进行UV光照，来改变腕带表面的分子结构排列，从而让腕带与肌肤的长时间接触下也可以表现的非常干爽，表面更为耐脏，比传统大多数智能手表的普通硅胶表带相比具有非常大的优势。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6131bd24c64ae9731e4971cdc14159f1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6131bd24c64ae9731e4971cdc14159f1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6131bd24c64ae9731e4971cdc14159f1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6131bd24c64ae9731e4971cdc14159f1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>表盘底部，Amazfit智能手表采用全新PPG监测功能，在检测准确率和功耗方面都有提升，配合全天候心率检测功能，让使用者可查看自己的心率变化，并及时发现异常表现。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7b6c42af9c8dced3987d1dc951f0993e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7b6c42af9c8dced3987d1dc951f0993e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7b6c42af9c8dced3987d1dc951f0993e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7b6c42af9c8dced3987d1dc951f0993e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-608549902b5647422d900cc589e372ff_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-608549902b5647422d900cc589e372ff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-608549902b5647422d900cc589e372ff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-608549902b5647422d900cc589e372ff_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>此次华米AMAZFIT智能手表的充电底座采用了更为自由的“躺充”设计，充电时只需将手表按HOME键凹槽方向嵌入到充电底座即可。在续航方面，华米AMAZFIT智能手表内置了390mAh锂聚合物电池，可以达到5天左右续航时长表现，这对于一块拥有1.3英寸AMOLED屏幕的智能手表来说非常强了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-20775dffc1f6c684afc62fc7ead58c81_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-20775dffc1f6c684afc62fc7ead58c81_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-20775dffc1f6c684afc62fc7ead58c81_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-20775dffc1f6c684afc62fc7ead58c81_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a8cd9903b0fb2bdb355461013c41e164_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a8cd9903b0fb2bdb355461013c41e164_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a8cd9903b0fb2bdb355461013c41e164_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a8cd9903b0fb2bdb355461013c41e164_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>性能方面，华米AMAZFIT智能手表还内置有一颗1.2GHz双核处理器及512M内存、4GB闪存空间，同时拥有光学感应器、加速度传感器、陀螺仪、地磁传感器、气压传感器、环境光传感器、佩戴检测传感器等多类元件，IP68级防水等级让使用者无惧环境因素的干扰。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d95af1f51f76336414fd314e1c67d8d8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d95af1f51f76336414fd314e1c67d8d8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d95af1f51f76336414fd314e1c67d8d8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d95af1f51f76336414fd314e1c67d8d8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>前面说过，华米很了解国内用户的需求，所以NFC一定会是主打功能之一，通过NFC刷公交地铁也成为智能手表最常用的功能之一。Amazfit智能手表通过内置了NFC芯片，目前已经支持了超165个城市的20000余条公交、地铁线路的交通卡刷卡。而除了公交卡功能外，AMAZFIT智能手表支持门禁卡模拟以及NFC芯片银行卡刷卡功能。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-86ed41665178865e4cd74db440b7a1b4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-86ed41665178865e4cd74db440b7a1b4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-86ed41665178865e4cd74db440b7a1b4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-86ed41665178865e4cd74db440b7a1b4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>Amazfit智能手表接入“小爱同学”是比较意外的，通过智能语音可以在手表上直接设置闹钟、日程、提醒等；或者也可以通过小爱同学查询天气、日历、限行等智能问答，使智能手表成为更方便的语音助手，大大提升了智能手表的使用体验。同时Amazfit智能手表还介入了米家智能家居控制，目前Amazfit智能手表已经接入了11款不同种类的智能家居产品，比如控制包括电灯、空气净化器、插座、开关、扫地机器人、空调、电风扇等。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dfc20d9a0ac5ac6a49ecc0fe30f7f2b6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dfc20d9a0ac5ac6a49ecc0fe30f7f2b6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fda2bb8c24af7b65f1878318bb622365_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fda2bb8c24af7b65f1878318bb622365_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>AMAZFIT智能手表并没有过分强调运动监测功能，不过它依旧继承了华米强大的运动基因，内置了11种运动模式，而且加入了GPS+GLONASS双星定位系统，能够更加精准定位运动轨迹，对于热衷户外运动的消费者来说绝对是福音。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-12e86ee41684bbd654ed4b6f6ec4fc4d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-12e86ee41684bbd654ed4b6f6ec4fc4d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-12e86ee41684bbd654ed4b6f6ec4fc4d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-12e86ee41684bbd654ed4b6f6ec4fc4d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>每一款产品对于消费者来说，实用性才是其真正的核心，而华米AMAZFIT智能手表除了兼具外表的科技范外，也是拥有着实用级的核心，而且也有更多的创新，包括在借助内置的小爱同学、米家联动体验和双星定位等方面极具优势。在日常的使用的过程中，多种运动模式、NFC、心率检测等功能上更是为我们的日常带来便利性。</p>",

            "title": "小狗机器人AI触控投影puppy cube上手体验 无屏触控爽到飞起", 
            "content": "<p>人们对于大屏观影的追求，已经从最开始的高清转变无屏的需求，所以投影这两年非常受欢迎。目前大多数无屏投影，基本上都被束缚在了横向的幕布或者墙面，大大限制了使用场景，只能在家看视频，而真正AI智能的无屏投影不能被屏幕束缚，横向应用应该被拓展。今年中旬，国内科技创新企业小狗机器人技术有限公司正式推出了首款AI触控投影puppy cube，实现了任意平面变身触控界面，将我们在科幻电影中看到的场景变为现实，一起来看下笔者的体验。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b80cf4b5f43177938d005c673d6ac732_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b80cf4b5f43177938d005c673d6ac732_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b80cf4b5f43177938d005c673d6ac732_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b80cf4b5f43177938d005c673d6ac732_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首先从这个名字来感受，puppy cube 是AI触控投影，所以和目前主流的智能投影相比，最大的区别在于可以投影后通过触控来实现操作，而且这个触控的“屏幕”就是你所投影的平面，内置安卓系统，和我们日常使用的手机、平板一样，非常具有科技感，无屏触控爽到飞起。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-626eec0faadf1b9de82d67e90d42ba76_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-626eec0faadf1b9de82d67e90d42ba76_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-626eec0faadf1b9de82d67e90d42ba76_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-626eec0faadf1b9de82d67e90d42ba76_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>外观设计：精致便携</b></h2><p>先来看AI触控投影puppy cube的外观设计，整体采用精致的立方体设计，采用了高透光覆膜玻璃面板+铝合金+PC/ABS工艺，机身三围为132×86×213（mm），产品重量为1.6 kg，加上内置了可续航150分钟长续航的55.5wh锂电池，可以轻松的任意搬动位置，来满足我们使用的任意平面。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9df1d89d99f364011ded511e3f4ca4da_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9df1d89d99f364011ded511e3f4ca4da_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9df1d89d99f364011ded511e3f4ca4da_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9df1d89d99f364011ded511e3f4ca4da_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>包装盒内除了主机和电源适配器外，随机还有一个蓝牙4.0多功能遥控器，以满足投大屏时候的使用，毕竟卧投模式下，大画面投影时（向上投墙）无法使用触控模式。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cf380f11138b2b165693ba6d1d99a974_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cf380f11138b2b165693ba6d1d99a974_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cf380f11138b2b165693ba6d1d99a974_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cf380f11138b2b165693ba6d1d99a974_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>主机正面是一个投射屏，印有小狗造型的Logo，很有辨识度。和普通投影居中的镜头不一样，puppy cube的镜头具有一定的倾斜角度，以满足不同平面投影需求，中间镜头两边的两个镜头，分别负责触控定位和自动对焦。主镜头采用DLP技术，物理分辨率为1280×720，兼容2K/4K分辨率，也就是说播放4k片源其实现实也会比720p片源要清楚。此外，这枚DLP镜头采用高透光镀膜工艺，中心亮度为300ANSI流明，色域非常高，达到&gt;=100%NTSC，中心对比度为600:1，配置上基本是家用投影机的主流配置。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d80c891575b7023dd264f42bdc5ef208_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d80c891575b7023dd264f42bdc5ef208_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d80c891575b7023dd264f42bdc5ef208_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d80c891575b7023dd264f42bdc5ef208_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>机身正面顶部，是电源开关按键和音量“+”、“-”按键，音量键下方还有一个500万像素摄像头，作用是卧投的时候可以作为视频会议的摄像头，非常强的一个功能点。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-747184ef874f819a874461db39f0496c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-747184ef874f819a874461db39f0496c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-747184ef874f819a874461db39f0496c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-747184ef874f819a874461db39f0496c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>可以看到整机左右两侧基本为全包裹的扬声器孔（兼顾散热），实际体验音效非常不错，采用了2.0双立体声声道，内置两个36mm全频发声单元的5W×2个扬声器，而且可以作为AI音箱使用，无论是看片追剧还是听音乐都可以感受到专业音箱的体验。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5dd0aece0b79db60438c272b4ab98bf5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5dd0aece0b79db60438c272b4ab98bf5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5dd0aece0b79db60438c272b4ab98bf5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5dd0aece0b79db60438c272b4ab98bf5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>环顾puppy cube的四周，正常情况下是看不到接口的，因为它的接口隐藏式设计，打开机身后盖可以看到一个3.5mm耳机口、DC-in口，以及USB 3.0 接口和一个HDMI 2.0接口。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fc0446e9057c18cf7d5c888192efb63c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fc0446e9057c18cf7d5c888192efb63c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9aa0367d19bc199ae360912e907e6857_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9aa0367d19bc199ae360912e907e6857_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31ebf2f6040298eccf69415fb035245f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31ebf2f6040298eccf69415fb035245f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31ebf2f6040298eccf69415fb035245f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31ebf2f6040298eccf69415fb035245f_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>立投模式：无屏触控，感受未来黑科技</b></h2><p>小狗机器人AI触控投影puppy cube从本质上来说是一款投影，但笔者认为他所实现的任意平面的触控才是真正的黑科技。puppy cube立投和卧投两种模式，也就是说他可以投在任意的水平面和竖屏面。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-77d50d2e314a4ba4c33fb71a10db3bd7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-77d50d2e314a4ba4c33fb71a10db3bd7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-77d50d2e314a4ba4c33fb71a10db3bd7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-77d50d2e314a4ba4c33fb71a10db3bd7_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d36cddb5d229cb350a7e0aaaefd0b593_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d36cddb5d229cb350a7e0aaaefd0b593_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d36cddb5d229cb350a7e0aaaefd0b593_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d36cddb5d229cb350a7e0aaaefd0b593_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首先来体验最为黑科技的立投模式，将puppy cube竖立放置桌面开机，系统自动对焦后就能把桌面变成一个23英寸的平板，这时候即可用手指触控操作，而且puppy cube支持十点触控，让笔者意外的是触控的精确度很高，延迟也很小，因为puppy cube使用了独特的“Anytouch”空间触控技术，适用于任意房间的桌面、地面。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1afce0b9bbc031f733e16c613b25ebd2_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"594\" data-rawheight=\"336\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1afce0b9bbc031f733e16c613b25ebd2_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"594\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1afce0b9bbc031f733e16c613b25ebd2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;594&#39; height=&#39;336&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"594\" data-rawheight=\"336\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1afce0b9bbc031f733e16c613b25ebd2_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"594\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1afce0b9bbc031f733e16c613b25ebd2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1afce0b9bbc031f733e16c613b25ebd2_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b356e53457b05a9c68179ebaaab1609f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b356e53457b05a9c68179ebaaab1609f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b356e53457b05a9c68179ebaaab1609f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b356e53457b05a9c68179ebaaab1609f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b356e53457b05a9c68179ebaaab1609f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b356e53457b05a9c68179ebaaab1609f_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad355f9d52aa78e8d9396f12d0f57dbb_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad355f9d52aa78e8d9396f12d0f57dbb_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad355f9d52aa78e8d9396f12d0f57dbb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;596&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"596\" data-rawheight=\"335\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad355f9d52aa78e8d9396f12d0f57dbb_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"596\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad355f9d52aa78e8d9396f12d0f57dbb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad355f9d52aa78e8d9396f12d0f57dbb_b.gif\"/></figure><p>立投模式下，第一点是投影画面足够大，第二则是无屏投影，桌面触控更方便。那么我们来想想，在什么情况下会使用到立投模式呢，相信大家第一个想到的会是游戏，因为画面足够大，还支持十点触控，两人甚至是多人都可以玩。而且是安卓系统，丰富的游戏只是适配的问题。笔者试玩了斗地主，大屏配合音箱效果，确实挺欢乐。puppy cube搭载Mstar智能处理芯片和4GB运行内存，闪存空间32GB，性能足够玩游戏，网友都已经开始玩起了吃鸡、王者荣耀等游戏，相当溜的操作。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-301148200f636904372878ad7da207cc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-301148200f636904372878ad7da207cc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-301148200f636904372878ad7da207cc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-301148200f636904372878ad7da207cc_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b5e116de9c2e071d463249e43296c323_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b5e116de9c2e071d463249e43296c323_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b5e116de9c2e071d463249e43296c323_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b5e116de9c2e071d463249e43296c323_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-95497b0a68db25eee4be88514105b732_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-95497b0a68db25eee4be88514105b732_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-95497b0a68db25eee4be88514105b732_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-95497b0a68db25eee4be88514105b732_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>再有就是厨房应用，现代人做饭往往都是根据美食家的做法来做，如果以前想一边做饭一边看视频教程，往往很麻烦，屏幕小不说，手上有水、油、面等东西时就无法操作平板，但有了puppy cube，放在厨台一侧投影做菜视频，无论手上有水有面，都能直接触控操作，而且大屏看得更清楚。值得点赞的是，为了满足厨房这一使用场景，puppy cube内置了超过10W+的中西精选菜谱。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-74a346a52eba71a88d273d1de80eb2fa_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-74a346a52eba71a88d273d1de80eb2fa_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-74a346a52eba71a88d273d1de80eb2fa_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-74a346a52eba71a88d273d1de80eb2fa_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>对于这种黑科技产品，孩子往往有超过大人的兴趣，正好puppy cube还具有非常好的教育功能，里面内置了儿歌、故事、绘本、学科启蒙和主体课程五大教育板块，5万+儿童资源，还兼容各大主流教育APP，孩子感兴趣能自己学习外，家长还能陪孩子一起游戏，绘画等等。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-31681f0563e6732023e889f2c27bccb6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"485\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-31681f0563e6732023e889f2c27bccb6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;485&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"485\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-31681f0563e6732023e889f2c27bccb6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-31681f0563e6732023e889f2c27bccb6_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69a33c969965f44281fe9cd972aa0b21_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69a33c969965f44281fe9cd972aa0b21_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69a33c969965f44281fe9cd972aa0b21_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69a33c969965f44281fe9cd972aa0b21_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>而且puppy cube投影时的光线是朝下投的，画面再通过地板、桌面的漫反射来进入人眼，不会因为光线过亮、过闪而对孩子脆弱的视网膜造成损害，大画面还能有效预防近视，所以说puppy cube是更适合儿童的家庭教育终端。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f3ee90d3d4d4fea080f06e4709aa6449_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f3ee90d3d4d4fea080f06e4709aa6449_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f3ee90d3d4d4fea080f06e4709aa6449_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f3ee90d3d4d4fea080f06e4709aa6449_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>卧投模式：家庭影院办公娱乐两不误</b></h2><p>在卧投状态下，puppy cube则可作为智慧家庭影院来使用，内置自动对焦系统和梯形自动矫正功能，可以确保画面不会失真。实际使用时，笔者不小心碰到了机器，导致投影画面变虚，puppy cube则能很快重新对焦，体验非常好。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-46735ea16a850509318f9a226ed04bf9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-46735ea16a850509318f9a226ed04bf9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-46735ea16a850509318f9a226ed04bf9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-46735ea16a850509318f9a226ed04bf9_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c904cd83b0e7414ec78d139cc219f890_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c904cd83b0e7414ec78d139cc219f890_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c904cd83b0e7414ec78d139cc219f890_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c904cd83b0e7414ec78d139cc219f890_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>家庭投影时，因为其采用超短焦，在距离墙面1米的位置投影，puppy cube即可投出100英寸的画面，当然了，因为puppy cube本身的功率和光源亮度相比传统的激光投影机要低，所以在距离墙面20公分的位置投射出60英寸的画面就足够看了，这也能保证画面亮度在一个比较舒适的范围，基本上白天没有阳光直射的客厅是可以看清楚画面内容的，如果晚上比较暗的环境则会有比较完美的观影效果。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-92d3d233dd3ce3d37ce3ab0fb1a61ad4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"439\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-92d3d233dd3ce3d37ce3ab0fb1a61ad4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "千元机首选 荣耀8X详细体验评测，能打满分", 
            "content": "<p>手机用户中，几乎一半以上的占比是千元机用户，所以对于手机厂商来说，千元机是企业产品线的重要一部分。9月初，荣耀带来了今年的千元机重磅产品-荣耀8X系列，各方面的表现都很抢眼，用力过猛成为了这代机器的实力标签。荣耀8X系列包含大小两款产品：荣耀8X与荣耀8X MAX，今天给大家带来的是1399元起的荣耀8X魅海蓝体验，看看这款笔者综合打分超过9分的千元机表现到底怎么样。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a2a5d4b33f9beaba0825f4c3e710a84b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a2a5d4b33f9beaba0825f4c3e710a84b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a2a5d4b33f9beaba0825f4c3e710a84b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a2a5d4b33f9beaba0825f4c3e710a84b_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5722cb6223467173f3024131d0003edf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5722cb6223467173f3024131d0003edf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5722cb6223467173f3024131d0003edf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5722cb6223467173f3024131d0003edf_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>窄边框全面屏 千元机屏占比新高度</b></h2><p>首先在外观方面，荣耀8X的这块屏幕非常抢眼，采用了旗舰级COF封装工艺，做到了4.25mm的超窄底边，整机屏占比高达91%，正面视觉效果抢眼，不免让人惊叹荣耀千元机的水平都是旗舰级吗。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cdd88e8eee63fdbd007b922e5426c2c9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cdd88e8eee63fdbd007b922e5426c2c9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cdd88e8eee63fdbd007b922e5426c2c9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cdd88e8eee63fdbd007b922e5426c2c9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>荣耀8X的刘海部分非常小，里面放置了前置摄像头、听筒和传感器。屏幕尺寸是6.5英寸超清显示屏，可以算得上是大屏了，但因为极高的品占比，拥有5.5英寸传统手机手感，所以屏幕的观感大，但是手感舒服并不会觉得大。19.5:9的显示比例，不仅看手机内容，刷微博时候看得多，看视频的时候能这个比列也能体验到好莱坞电影的比列。</p><p>屏幕色彩表现，我的直观感受是更鲜艳，官方数据也应征了这点，色彩显示区域：1670万色，色域85%（典型值）。同时在看视频时自适应进行优化，获得更好的大片观赏性。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5b5fae428f78d64168aa17827268efd5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5b5fae428f78d64168aa17827268efd5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5b5fae428f78d64168aa17827268efd5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5b5fae428f78d64168aa17827268efd5_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>莱茵 TÜV 低蓝光认证 保护眼睛很重要</b></h2><p>如果按照之前网瘾的说法，现在的人几乎都催手机成瘾，几乎一天大部分的时间都是在看手机，时间一长就会感觉到眼睛不舒服。为了缓解玩手机屏幕蓝光对眼睛造成的伤害，荣耀8X将业内领先的低蓝光认证首次运用到手机上，严格抑制屏幕光中的有害蓝光，结合自适应色温调节功能，减少长时间使用手机对眼睛的伤害，这点要给个大大的赞。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-02d2925ae677b580f2349da73bd656a6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-02d2925ae677b580f2349da73bd656a6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-02d2925ae677b580f2349da73bd656a6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-02d2925ae677b580f2349da73bd656a6_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>创新双纹理玻璃 这个设计可不千元</b></h2><p>受制于价格的因素，一般千元机无论是机身设计还是材质，都不会太用心。虽然此次荣耀8X也是定位腰部的千元机，但是机身的设计一点也不千元，可以对于2000元以上的旗舰，所以在外观设计方面，笔者主观打分能给到9分以上。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fc701caebd61426402ffff591f337b3a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fc701caebd61426402ffff591f337b3a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fc701caebd61426402ffff591f337b3a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fc701caebd61426402ffff591f337b3a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>得益于荣耀品质，此次荣耀8X机身创新使用双纹理拼接设计，玻璃机身颜值非常高，摄像头一侧的玻璃颜色较深，竖排AI双摄，同时印有英文AI CAMEAR字样，底部是荣耀的英文标识，看起来非常具有质感。具荣耀官方数据，背部的处理工艺多达15层，再加上2.5D极光玻璃，整个机身的手感和质感都非常不错。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-db0ef8776527205fd3330aa3c49569ab_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-db0ef8776527205fd3330aa3c49569ab_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-db0ef8776527205fd3330aa3c49569ab_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-db0ef8776527205fd3330aa3c49569ab_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>电源键和音量键集中在机身的右侧，按键反馈恰到好处，机身底部保留了3.5mm耳机接口，充电接口采用的是普通的USB接口，并非目前依已经几乎普及的Type-C接口，是笔者认为机身方面唯一的遗憾。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dfe2fff921607d6fdf43e3897320c9d6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dfe2fff921607d6fdf43e3897320c9d6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dfe2fff921607d6fdf43e3897320c9d6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dfe2fff921607d6fdf43e3897320c9d6_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3c0e45814b71aae24f603608749d5b94_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3c0e45814b71aae24f603608749d5b94_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3c0e45814b71aae24f603608749d5b94_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3c0e45814b71aae24f603608749d5b94_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>麒麟710 准旗舰级处理器 千元也强悍</b></h2><p>荣耀8X采用的是麒麟710处理器，作为麒麟首款12nm工艺制程处理器，采用旗舰级A73大核心设计，性能相对于上一代产品麒麟659提升了不少，其中GPU性能提升130%，对于千元机来说性能已经很强悍性了，玩游戏都没问题。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1b676ae914faf798370604a44eaf5b3c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"488\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1b676ae914faf798370604a44eaf5b3c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;488&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"488\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1b676ae914faf798370604a44eaf5b3c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1b676ae914faf798370604a44eaf5b3c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>除了处理器的性能外，荣耀8X天生自带吓人的图形处理技术GPU Turbo，大家都知道，这个软硬件协同的图形处理加速技术，打通EMUI及GPU和CPU之间的处理瓶颈，极大提升系统图形处理效率，能做到持续输出平稳高帧率的游戏画面。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8db51fb94d60fa14513d186790385ad_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8db51fb94d60fa14513d186790385ad_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8db51fb94d60fa14513d186790385ad_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8db51fb94d60fa14513d186790385ad_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5d52cecbaf1a562ded74dd4fab372781_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5d52cecbaf1a562ded74dd4fab372781_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5d52cecbaf1a562ded74dd4fab372781_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5d52cecbaf1a562ded74dd4fab372781_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>那么荣耀8X实际玩游戏怎么样？对于《王者荣耀》的测试来看，得益于GPU Turbo的加持，只要不是开高特效，都能流畅运行。而对于《刺激战场》这种要求很高的游戏来说荣耀8X可能不太适合玩，比较安卓旗舰手机的体验也一般，所以对于千元的荣耀8X也不必强求。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-34b96461c145a1d4aa2f4685f6aee5c9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-34b96461c145a1d4aa2f4685f6aee5c9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-34b96461c145a1d4aa2f4685f6aee5c9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-34b96461c145a1d4aa2f4685f6aee5c9_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>2000万AI双摄 拍照优化给满分</b></h2><p>以往千元机在拍照方面的表现，大家给出的统一结论是拍的也就能看吧。但笔者实际用荣耀8X拍摄景物照片后的效果还是很意外，成像表现在千元机里面几乎可以给满分。荣耀8X采用的是竖排双摄2000万+200万，F1.8大光圈，对于细节和色彩的还原非常不错。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-556d01670480ffb75abbb3449935d1dc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-556d01670480ffb75abbb3449935d1dc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-556d01670480ffb75abbb3449935d1dc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-556d01670480ffb75abbb3449935d1dc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>以下是笔者实际生活中随手拍的样张，原图未做任何修改变动，大家觉得对于千元机打满分不为过吧？</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3d38e7ea6b7cbf1afdb8b25570f3196a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3d38e7ea6b7cbf1afdb8b25570f3196a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e2b7491f973009fd8df93e53414fc8fe_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e2b7491f973009fd8df93e53414fc8fe_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>首先来看下这两款记录仪的硬件配置，两家可以说是各有所长，但盯盯拍在功能方面存在的优势显而易见。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6e33cfdd1536213d18bdbe27c0e5cf81_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"452\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6e33cfdd1536213d18bdbe27c0e5cf81_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;452&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"452\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6e33cfdd1536213d18bdbe27c0e5cf81_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6e33cfdd1536213d18bdbe27c0e5cf81_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>作为miniONE的升级产品，miniONE Pro并没有在外观上做任何的改动，采用了家族化的圆柱形极简风格，能最大化的节省安装空间，同时有利于隐藏不干扰视线。无屏幕设计可以说是盯盯拍产品的特性，让记录仪做他该做的事。miniONE Pro整机没有一颗按键，存储也是内置，不需要单独购买内存卡，只要接通车载电源后就可以直接进入工作工作状态。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-772ba5e5c11940ec1dc8d35b725b9a6a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-772ba5e5c11940ec1dc8d35b725b9a6a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-772ba5e5c11940ec1dc8d35b725b9a6a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-772ba5e5c11940ec1dc8d35b725b9a6a_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c3786d18ba96d520a13809c7708a6034_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c3786d18ba96d520a13809c7708a6034_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c3786d18ba96d520a13809c7708a6034_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c3786d18ba96d520a13809c7708a6034_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>相比盯盯拍，小蚁在机身方面则是反方向设计，一如既往的正方形设计，配有一块屏幕，外加多功能的按键，组合起来就可以完成基本的设置。虽然这么设计可以不通过手机就能完成设计，有一定的便利性，但同时也是缺点，比如在车上安装好，还需要手动设置时间，而连接手机的盯盯拍会自动同步手机时间。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-113918321a6e5f93bccae86ffb58e1c7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-113918321a6e5f93bccae86ffb58e1c7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-113918321a6e5f93bccae86ffb58e1c7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-113918321a6e5f93bccae86ffb58e1c7_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd11b5a1abc14e43465588e986ca8428_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd11b5a1abc14e43465588e986ca8428_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd11b5a1abc14e43465588e986ca8428_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd11b5a1abc14e43465588e986ca8428_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>机身细节方面，盯盯拍印有英文logo，右侧是镜头。机身下部是一个mic孔和一个RESET的复位键孔，支持语音操控。机身一侧预留了数据传输孔和电源接孔。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-46742a0e3f2113fda070be83c598e1a7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-46742a0e3f2113fda070be83c598e1a7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-46742a0e3f2113fda070be83c598e1a7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-46742a0e3f2113fda070be83c598e1a7_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1245853076970904b6e704a8f66731ef_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1245853076970904b6e704a8f66731ef_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1245853076970904b6e704a8f66731ef_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1245853076970904b6e704a8f66731ef_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-055985bacf3179969d75465acf4e0aa6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-055985bacf3179969d75465acf4e0aa6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-055985bacf3179969d75465acf4e0aa6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-055985bacf3179969d75465acf4e0aa6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>小蚁的机身方面，除了正面凸起的镜头和背面的屏幕外，机身左侧是内存卡槽（单独购买class10的卡），机身上方是扬声器、散热孔和支架卡槽等，设计的比较繁琐。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2322aae9b1ae38a3300d2096282ed4e8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2322aae9b1ae38a3300d2096282ed4e8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2322aae9b1ae38a3300d2096282ed4e8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2322aae9b1ae38a3300d2096282ed4e8_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-84bb570da91d0f8399d1fae02cd4cf5f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-84bb570da91d0f8399d1fae02cd4cf5f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
