width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3c9472a8319ff6d56b3fc236b4e9ac4e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3c9472a8319ff6d56b3fc236b4e9ac4e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>包装内的配件方面，miniONE Pro除了机身主体，记录仪支架套筒，USB车充，3.5m车载电源线，支架3M胶贴，安装工具棒。小蚁的配件里是不含安装工具压线棒，虽然是一个小物件，但在体验上差很多，自己手动走线的用户只能另外找工具才能隐藏走线。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ef340fc0b1e533bf829264f161cddd0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ef340fc0b1e533bf829264f161cddd0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ef340fc0b1e533bf829264f161cddd0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ef340fc0b1e533bf829264f161cddd0_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-219a4c4b8831c6c67d0bebc232df51b5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-219a4c4b8831c6c67d0bebc232df51b5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-219a4c4b8831c6c67d0bebc232df51b5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-219a4c4b8831c6c67d0bebc232df51b5_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d921b74ff37187a7081325601f7cf516_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d921b74ff37187a7081325601f7cf516_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d921b74ff37187a7081325601f7cf516_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d921b74ff37187a7081325601f7cf516_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-10e6e8129b8fde73713102a09e398ff2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-10e6e8129b8fde73713102a09e398ff2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-10e6e8129b8fde73713102a09e398ff2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-10e6e8129b8fde73713102a09e398ff2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>既然是公平公正的上车对比，自然是两个一起安装在差不多同样视角的位置。安装两者都采用的是直接3M粘胶站在挡风玻璃上，盯盯拍和小蚁都建议先安装支架，再放入记录仪主体。但说实话我个人非常不喜欢这种安装方式，粘上去移位很麻烦，而且还有脱落和给玻璃上留下粘胶的风险，建议厂家考虑下静电贴安装，虽然成本会稍微增加，但用户体验会非常好。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0a851f75b41cbeeafa5422405a2fea22_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0a851f75b41cbeeafa5422405a2fea22_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0a851f75b41cbeeafa5422405a2fea22_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0a851f75b41cbeeafa5422405a2fea22_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-aa2f5bc787acdb5b2e1bd6327847a687_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-aa2f5bc787acdb5b2e1bd6327847a687_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-aa2f5bc787acdb5b2e1bd6327847a687_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-aa2f5bc787acdb5b2e1bd6327847a687_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-516c01ba7f5aaf16843a6dadfedf4d5d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-516c01ba7f5aaf16843a6dadfedf4d5d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-516c01ba7f5aaf16843a6dadfedf4d5d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-516c01ba7f5aaf16843a6dadfedf4d5d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>安装好后下载对应的APP，完成设置后就可以老司机开车了。直接上白天和晚上记录仪同时录制的视频截图对比，可以看出盯盯拍的录制画质可以说是秒杀小蚁，虽然小蚁的分辨率是超过盯盯拍的，但为什么画质这么差，白天光线良好的情况下，前车的车牌几乎都看不清。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f77f5e88dc8168536cfffa1fb220840e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"363\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f77f5e88dc8168536cfffa1fb220840e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;363&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"363\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f77f5e88dc8168536cfffa1fb220840e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f77f5e88dc8168536cfffa1fb220840e_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af89a31202ffc41e6c16782afb60c9d7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af89a31202ffc41e6c16782afb60c9d7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af89a31202ffc41e6c16782afb60c9d7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af89a31202ffc41e6c16782afb60c9d7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>要分析这个问题，的归根到行车记录仪的深层优化了，并不是你的参数高实际表现就好。盯盯拍miniONE Pro采用了H.265编解码新技术，可以将1080P视频增加到1296P的高清效果！同时改善码流、编码质量、延时和算法复杂度之间的关系，清晰度提升50%，达到最优化设置。同时，H.265拥有更高的压缩率，同样的画质，H.265比H.264 占用的存储空间理论要少50%，具有绝对的优势。加上WDR宽动态，昏暗光线下会自动补光，强光下会抑制，可以对画面的清晰度有更好的保障。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5cbaa3e5a0062502e9c63483a1fc658e_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"390\" data-rawheight=\"219\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5cbaa3e5a0062502e9c63483a1fc658e_b.jpg\" class=\"content_image\" width=\"390\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;390&#39; height=&#39;219&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"390\" data-rawheight=\"219\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5cbaa3e5a0062502e9c63483a1fc658e_b.jpg\" class=\"content_image lazy\" width=\"390\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5cbaa3e5a0062502e9c63483a1fc658e_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5399926a021f0550612b5180096fa22b_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"420\" data-rawheight=\"236\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5399926a021f0550612b5180096fa22b_b.jpg\" class=\"content_image\" width=\"420\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;420&#39; height=&#39;236&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"420\" data-rawheight=\"236\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5399926a021f0550612b5180096fa22b_b.jpg\" class=\"content_image lazy\" width=\"420\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5399926a021f0550612b5180096fa22b_b.gif\"/></figure><p>在广角覆盖上，小蚁的官方数据是165°，盯盯拍的是140°，同样的时刻和角度，对比看起来小蚁的确实广角更大，但两者都能覆盖完整的3条车道。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ea761c0e671f81b837d0dc4ee5f53faa_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"361\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ea761c0e671f81b837d0dc4ee5f53faa_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;361&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"361\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ea761c0e671f81b837d0dc4ee5f53faa_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ea761c0e671f81b837d0dc4ee5f53faa_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b566890dfe2bee4efdc09f0258524ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"361\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b566890dfe2bee4efdc09f0258524ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;361&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"361\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b566890dfe2bee4efdc09f0258524ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6b566890dfe2bee4efdc09f0258524ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>夜晚的行车记录也是很重要的一部分，所以选择这两款对比的时候，正是都具有也是功能，所以才能公平的对比。盯盯拍miniONE Pro所使用的传感器是索尼的IMX307 starvis（星光夜视系列），IMX307拥有更大的传感器尺寸和单像素尺寸，光圈达到了F1.8，所以在夜间、隧道、地下车库或者是光线不好的地方行车，借助这枚摄像头也能拍到清晰，足够亮度的画面，盯盯拍的实际表现也应证了这点，画面亮度和清晰度都可以。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-de02a8214296f8032c265bc8dc8a08a9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-de02a8214296f8032c265bc8dc8a08a9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;360&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"360\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-de02a8214296f8032c265bc8dc8a08a9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-de02a8214296f8032c265bc8dc8a08a9_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-288bca7cae7fcb4bd51d4ba373f4db90_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-288bca7cae7fcb4bd51d4ba373f4db90_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;350&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"350\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-288bca7cae7fcb4bd51d4ba373f4db90_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-288bca7cae7fcb4bd51d4ba373f4db90_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>相比盯盯拍miniONE Pro，小蚁记录仪青春版的夜晚表现就差的不是一丁半点了，说是具有夜视功能，但在光线暗的环境下，和普通的记录仪没什么差别，画面亮度不够，画质也一般，大家自行看对比图。而且比较怪异的是我在小蚁产品的电商页面没有看到任何关于夜视的介绍。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2a5c8bb8e336dcc7a0a237bfdf088f4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"357\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2a5c8bb8e336dcc7a0a237bfdf088f4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;357&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"357\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2a5c8bb8e336dcc7a0a237bfdf088f4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2a5c8bb8e336dcc7a0a237bfdf088f4_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d739ce007376dad5692f5b6162a0d314_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"361\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d739ce007376dad5692f5b6162a0d314_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;361&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"361\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d739ce007376dad5692f5b6162a0d314_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d739ce007376dad5692f5b6162a0d314_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>除了车辆较多和有路灯的路段，我还测试了小区几乎没有光线的路段，可以看到盯盯拍的画面亮度依然充足，对于侧边的车牌放大后依旧可以清晰录制，而小蚁录制的则模糊一片。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-373a9e47a252e4b0530a818e106b080d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"410\" data-rawheight=\"231\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-373a9e47a252e4b0530a818e106b080d_b.jpg\" class=\"content_image\" width=\"410\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;410&#39; height=&#39;231&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"410\" data-rawheight=\"231\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-373a9e47a252e4b0530a818e106b080d_b.jpg\" class=\"content_image lazy\" width=\"410\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-373a9e47a252e4b0530a818e106b080d_b.gif\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-92c39d789e5c5c2d2819642be4708495_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"560\" data-rawheight=\"315\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-92c39d789e5c5c2d2819642be4708495_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"560\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-92c39d789e5c5c2d2819642be4708495_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;560&#39; height=&#39;315&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"560\" data-rawheight=\"315\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-92c39d789e5c5c2d2819642be4708495_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"560\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-92c39d789e5c5c2d2819642be4708495_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-92c39d789e5c5c2d2819642be4708495_b.gif\"/></figure><p>在其他功能方面，盯盯拍miniONE Pro具有停车监控功能，停车后，记录仪会一秒一帧缩时录制，当检测到车辆被碰撞、剐蹭、损伤时，可以自动唤醒拍摄，不过要实现这个功能需要单独购买使用降压线。小蚁记录仪青春版具有ADAS驾驶辅助功能，可以提醒车道偏离和前车距离测检测，但使用这个功能后，我有点想骂小蚁的工程师，优化的一坨屎，我已经在停车位停车有一会儿了，还一直提醒我前车太近，这个问题后来在等红绿灯的时候再次验证了，两辆车都停着会不停的提醒，所以最后我只能把这个功能关了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9da4ebc8a067da38a681b5f409e0b1e3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9da4ebc8a067da38a681b5f409e0b1e3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9da4ebc8a067da38a681b5f409e0b1e3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9da4ebc8a067da38a681b5f409e0b1e3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>社交功能会让一个APP变得不再枯燥乏味，而对于记录仪这种视频录制工具，有时候行车会录制一些好笑的，或者有警示意义的视频，那么我们就会希望分享。盯盯拍和小蚁的APP里面，都集成了社区分享功能，但盯盯拍的更深度，APP里面可以将行车记录仪的视频进行剪辑，还能配音再分享。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5114fbc495c3d9fa68e73768ff3901c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"379\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5114fbc495c3d9fa68e73768ff3901c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;379&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"379\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5114fbc495c3d9fa68e73768ff3901c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5114fbc495c3d9fa68e73768ff3901c_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c58213191cbfd65ca2d64879acf61fc9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"567\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c58213191cbfd65ca2d64879acf61fc9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;567&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"567\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c58213191cbfd65ca2d64879acf61fc9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c58213191cbfd65ca2d64879acf61fc9_b.jpg\"/></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-132545a76252a1c3b229754498dc3a2b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"567\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-132545a76252a1c3b229754498dc3a2b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;567&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"567\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-132545a76252a1c3b229754498dc3a2b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-132545a76252a1c3b229754498dc3a2b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>此外，两个APP里面还提供一些车主服务，盯盯拍有违章查询功能，小蚁则向洗车，保养方向，可以查询合作的合作商等。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1bf81566571cfa4c72cfe51e43bce422_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"379\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1bf81566571cfa4c72cfe51e43bce422_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
